Botanos/Appetizers
Guacamole
Our famous fresh avocado dip, prepared tableside
Empanada de Camaron Adobado
Cilantro infused corn masa stuffed with guajillo adobo shrimp, three cheeses, poblano cream, pickled onions
Taquitos
Crispy chicken taquitos, chipotle salsa, sour cream, queso fresco & pickled red onions
Nachos
Homemade tortilla chips individually layered with refried beans, melted cheese, guacamole, sour cream and a side of jalapeños
Sopes OAXAQUEÑOS
Fresh masa sopes topped with guacamole mole, caramelized plantains, queso fresco, micro greens.
Ceviche del Dia
See server for our seasonal ceviche of the day.
Trio Queso Fundido
Fondue Chihuahua, fontina, white cheddar cheese, served with warm tortillas- 2 Add Chorizo or Sauteed Mushrooms
Flour tortilla quesadilla filled with cheese, grilled onions and bell peppers. Served with sour cream, pickled red onions and pico de gallo. Add $2 for chicken, chorizo, mushroom or ground beef
Quesadillas
Flour tortilla quesadilla filled with cheese, grilled onions and bell peppers. Served with sour cream, pickled red onions and pico de gallo. Add $2 for chicken, chorizo, mushroom or ground beef
Salbutes de Chochinita Pibil
Mini tostaditas, black beans, cochinita pibil, queso fresco, pickled red onions, micro greens
Botana  Mariachi
Try a little bit of everything with our appetizer sampler. Includes nachos, chicken flautas, quesadilla, tostaditas de cochinita pibil and a side of guacamole and sour cream.
Ensalada Mariachi
Soups & Salads/ Ensaladas y Sopas
Mixed greens, queso fresco, red onions, tomatoes, avocado, roasted corn, chipotle balsamic vinaigrette dressing
Ensalada Tropical
Mixed Greens, Papaya, Mango, Sliced Gala Apples, Toasted pumpkin seeds, pecans, sesame crusted cream cheese, honey jalapeno vinaigrette dressing
Caldo De Pollo
Freshly prepared chicken soup with fresh vegetables served with a side of Mexican rice, cilantro, onion, lime and warm tortillas.
Sopa de Tortilla
A Bowl of our traditional chipotle and tomato-based tortilla soup topped with avocado, sour cream, tortilla strips, and toasted guajillo rings.
and pickled red cabbage. Your choice of chicken, ground beef, or vegetarian.
Taco Salad
A large edible taco shell layered with refried beans, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream, avocado
and pickled red cabbage. Your choice of chicken, ground beef, or vegetarian.
Carnes/Meats
Carne Asada Tampiquena
10. oz marinated skirt steak grilled to perfection. Served with a chicken mole enchilada, Mexican rice and refried pinto beans
Cochinita Pibil
Succulent pork marinated with achiote, sour orange juice, and spices, cooked in banana leaves, and topped with pickled red onions. Served with sauteed black beans, white rice, salsa chipotle and steamy tortillas
Carne Asada Suiza
10oz. marinated skirt steak grilled to perfection topped with your choice of salsa: Suiza, Mole, Verde, Chipotle or Ranchera and melted cheese, sour cream. Served with Mexican rice and refried pinto beans.
Carne Asada con Rajas Poblanos
10oz. skirt steak topped with creamy roasted rajas poblanas and queso cotija. Served with cilantro rice and roasted corn
Carne Asada Costena
This is our house specialty. A grilled 10. oz skirt steak topped with specialty sauteed seasoned cream shrimp. Served with cilantro lime rice and black beans.
Pollo/Chicken
Pollo Relleno
Breaded chicken roulade stuffed with chorizo, sweet corn, poblano peppers & asadero cheese. Served over creamy tomatillo salsa, cilantro lime white rice and sauteed spinach
Pollo Costeno
Grilled chicken breast topped with specialty sauteed seasoned cream shrimp. Served with cilantro lime rice and black beans.
Pollo En Salsa
Grilled Chicken breast simmered in your choice of salsa: Suiza, Mole, Verde, Chipotle or Ranchera. Served with Mexican rice and refried pinto beans
Antojitos/ Mexican Favorites
Flautas
3 flute shaped crispy corn tortillas filled with chicken, cheese; topped with tomatoes, queso fresco, sour cream and guacamole
$
2 corn tortillas tacos with your choice of chicken, ground beef, chorizo, guacamole or vegetarian; topped with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese and sour cream. Add $3 for skirt steak
Tacos
$
2 corn tortillas tacos with your choice of chicken, ground beef, chorizo, guacamole or vegetarian; topped with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese and sour cream. Add $3 for skirt steak
Add skirt steak for 3, Shrimp for 2. Burrito Suizo for 2- topped with melted cheese, sour cream and your choice of salsa.
Burrito
A large flour tortilla stuffed with refried beans, lettuce, tomatoes, sour cream & cheese. With your choice of chicken, beef, or vegetables.
Add skirt steak for 3, Shrimp for 2. Burrito Suizo for 2- topped with melted cheese, sour cream and your choice of salsa.
Chimichanga
Deep fried burrito filled with beans, tomatoes and cheese, with your choice of: Chicken, Chorizo, Ground Beef or vegetarian. The Chimichanga is then topped with sour cream and your choice of salsa.
Enchiladas
3 rolled corn tortillas stuffed with your choice of chicken, ground beef, cheese of vegetables. Topped with sour cream, melted cheese and your choice of salsa.
Tostadas
2 flat open-face, crispy tostadas with your choice of chicken, ground beef, chorizo, guacamole or begetables; topped with refried beans, lettuce, tomatoes, queso fresco and sour cream.
Tamales
2 homemade cornmeal tamales wrapped in cornhusk and filled with your choice of chicken in green sauce, pork in red sauce, or vegetarian with cheese, roasted poblano and onions.
Quessabirria Tacos
3 quesabirria tacos, served with Mexican rice, refried beans, cilantro, salsa ranchera, onions, lime, and beef birria broth.
Fajitas
your choice of marinated stripes of grilled chicken breast, skirt steak, or grilled shrimp, served on a hot iron skilled with green peppers, onions, and tomatoes.
Vegetarian Fajitas
our specialty fajita plate with grilled green peppers, onions, potatoes, carrots, zucchini, tomatoes, and mushrooms.
Mariscos/Seafood
Tacos de Camaron
3 shrimp tacos sauteed in a chipotle garlic butter sauce topped with avocado and micro greens. Served with corn esquites & cilantro lime rice.
Tacos de Tilapia
3 grilled tilapia tacos topped with tequila lime sriracha mayo, pickled cabbage, and our pico de gallo. Served with a side of corn esquites and cilantro lime rice.
Tilapia al Ajillo
Grilled tilapia topped with our speciality fresh garlic-guajillo butter sauce. Served with a side of corn & cilantro lime rice.
Salmon a la Talla
Pan Seared achiote adobo salmon, mango pico de gallo, cilantro lime rice, and caramelized plantains.
Camarones al Mojo de Ajo
Shrimp topped with our specialty fresh garlic finished off with a touch of butter, cilantro, and fresh lime juice. Served with a side of corn esquites and cilantro lime rice.
Vegetariano/Vegetarian
Enchiladas de Platano
3 rolled corn tortillas, stuffed with fried plantains topped with our traditional Mole poblano and queso fresco.
Cazuela de Rajas Poblanas
creamy casserole of roasted poblano peppers, sliced onions, garlic and queso cotija. Served with cilantro lime white rice and warm tortillas.
Burrito Poblano
Our specialty vegetarian burrito with black beans, fire-roasted poblano peppers, cilantro lime rice, corn, avocado, lettuce, sour cream, and chihuahua cheese.
Chiles Rellenos
2 poblano peppers slightly egg battered and pan-fried. The peppers are then stuffed with Chihuahua cheese and topped off with chipotle sauce and sour cream. Served with warm tortillas.
Combinaciones/Combinations
Mexican Combo
Beef mini chimichanga, chicken taco, and a cheese enchilada.
Azteca Combo
Guacamole taco, cheese enchilada, and Chile relleno.
El Mariachi Combo
Grilled skirt steak, chicken flauta, and a chile relleno.
Fiesta Combo
Chicken tostada, beef taco, cheese enchilada, and a chile relleno

LA CANTINA MENUS
Dine-in  •  Carryout & Delivery  •  Vegan  •  Catering
La Cantina Grill Mexican Restaurant in Chicago
Authentic Mexican Restaurant  •  Chicago  •  South Loop
ORDER NOW
VIEW FOOD MENU (PDF)
VIEW DRINK MENU (PDF)
La Cantina Bar & Grill serves authentic Mexican cuisine using traditional techniques and the freshest ingredients.
In addition to our dining menu full of Mexican favorites from Nacho Platters to Lomo en Salsa de Arbol, we are proud to offer a full
VEGAN
menu with vegan proteins, cheeses, sour cream and other vegan ingredients.
Our bar is packed full of Chicago’s widest range of
tequila and mezcal
choices. Fresh, delicious margaritas and cocktails are crafted to be both unique and accessible. We carry a large selection of domestic, craft and Mexican beers and are also known for having Chicago’s best Sangria.
We are located south of Millennium Park, west of Soldier Field and very near McCormick Place in Chicago’s fast growing South Loop neighborhood. We are also proud to serve the Columbia College community of students and faculty and offer a special Student/Lunch Menu Monday – Friday. Check out
CATERING
menus for your next private event or party.
Hours of Operation
11AM-10PM Monday-Thursday
11AM-11PM Friday

Reviews
Guillermo Ortega
star
star
star
star
star
26 September 2025
One of the best and authentic Mexican Food restaurant in Chicago.  Food is the best, service is really fast and efficient..The waiters are amazing,  friendly and helpful.  You must try the unique  Black Salsa in Chicago.
Raffy Piso
star
star
star
star
star
23 September 2025
love their black salsa! everything is fresh made to order. high recommend
Cody Jurasek
star
star
star
star
star
15 September 2025
Authentic dishes with a wide variety of ingredients. The tacos are loaded with ingredients; beer and alcohol is very reasonably priced. Service is very prompt, efficient, and friendly. Definitely would recommend dining in on an empty stomach.
Christopher McKay
star
star
star
star
star
13 September 2025
Love the soup they give you right away.  Their black salsa is phenomenal!  I have yet to try something here I didn't like.
Asten Rathbun
star
star
star
star
star
10 September 2025
A bartender at Metropolitan Brewing recommended this place.  It's sit down with table service or takeout.  Pay at the register if you sit down.

They have an excellent roasted black salsa with chips for the table. I got a three taco platter with rice and beans.   Barbacoa and ground beef tacos were great!  Chicken was not nearly as good, but passable.   

Staff was very friendly and we quite enjoyed our meal.  Definitely would go back!

functional cookies

Required
These cookies are essential in order to enable you to move around Controller's web application and use its features, such as accessing secure areas. Without these cookies services like shopping baskets or e-billing cannot be provided.

Functional
These cookies allow the Controller’s web application to remember choices you make while browsing and/or using the application (such as your user name, language or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features.
These cookies can also be used to remember changes you have made to text size, language and other parts of web pages that you can customize.
The information these cookies collect will not personally identify you, and they cannot track your browsing activity on non Controller’s websites.
For reliable review of your order status, on-screen on the application, in real-time, and also for easy reordering, your data may be saved on your device, serving a cookie locally.

Ayayay highlights the diversity of Mexican street food, elevated with Peruvian influences and modern techniques.
Our menu is built around fresh ingredients and balanced flavors. Expect tacos, burritos, quesadillas, guacamole, and house-made salsas, paired with a curated cocktail program featuring mezcal, tequila, and pisco.

name: Guzman y Gomez
raw_text:
Our Food | Guzman y Gomez Mexican Kitchen
Order Now
Our Food
Menu
Clean Food
Delivery
Catering
Nutrition and Allergens
Work with us
Careers
About Us
Our Values
Community
Newsroom
Fundraising
Sponsorship
Locations
GOMEX
Contact Us
FAQs
It's all about the food
We’re on a mission to reinvent fast food for the better, changing the way the world eats one burrito at a time.
Our Menu
Entrées
Breakfast
Fillings
Sides and Dessert
Chipotle-Seasoned Fries
We love our fries! Skin-on, real potato fries tossed in GYG's own Chipotle seasoning. Try with our range of GYG dipping sauces including Chipotle Mayo, Jalapeño Ketchup and Mex Chimi Mayo.
Order
Guac, Queso and Corn Chips
A true labor of love, it took us 21 versions to perfect our crunchy, house-made corn chips! Pair them with our fresh Pico De Gallo salsa, delicious melted queso cheese, or with our famous Guacamole! Our guac is prepared fresh daily, using only the best avocados, and mixed with our beautiful pico de gallo, a splash of lime juice, then seasoned to perfection.
Order
Soft Serve
GYG's Soft Serve is made with real cream and contains no added preservatives. Available in a Sundae, and Churro Sundae with our Dulce de Leche or Mexican spiced Chocolate sauce!
Order
Churros
There's no better way to finish off your GYG meal! Our hot and crunchy churros are quickly fried to order, then rolled in cinnamon sugar and served with your choice of decadent Dulce de Leche or Mexican spiced Chocolate dipping sauces.
Order
Queso Fries
Our Chipotle-seasoned, skin-on fries covered in melted queso sauce. Go on, treat yourself!
Order
Salsa Station
Fine-tune your meal exactly how you like it! Add from our range of mild to hot salsas, or top up with our selection of Mexican-style pickles, freshly chopped cilantro and Spanish onion. Best of all? They’re all free when you order through the app or in-restaurant! Simply ask our crew when ordering in-restaurant and they'll help you out.
Order
Drinks
Choose from a range of delicious drinks! Whether it’s a natural Jarritos soda, a delicious Horchata, or even your favorite alcoholic beverage - we've got something for everyone!
Order
Breakfast Burritos
Fall in love with our breakfast burritos! Your choice of crispy bacon, house-made chicken chorizo, or sautéed vegetables, topped with cage-free scrambled egg, and wrapped up together with a crunchy hash brown, Jack cheese, and pico de gallo. Oh, and you just have to add our fresh guacamole. Now that’s a good morning!
Ingredients
Order
Fluffy scrambled eggs
Succulent meat or veggies of your choice
Jack cheese
Pico de Gallo (a fresh-chopped tomato salsa)
Hashbrown
Guacamole or Avocado on Toast
Our simple yet tasty take on a classic! Either plain avocado or our fresh guacamole spread over lightly toasted sourdough bread. Perfect if you're on the move!
Order
Breakfast Tacos
Our breakfast taco is a handful of morning goodness! It starts with a flour tortilla, adding fluffy scrambled eggs, crispy bacon or chorizo and then topped with Jack cheese, house-made Pico de Gallo and finished with Jalapeño Ketchup.
Ingredients
Order
Soft Flour Tortilla
Fluffy scrambled eggs
Jack cheese
Pico de Gallo (a fresh-chopped tomato salsa)
Succulent meat or veggies of your choice
Topped with Jalapeño Ketchup
Scrambled Egg Bowls
Feel like a lighter start to the day? Try your favorite breakfast burrito in a bowl! You'll get all your favorite fillings, without the tortilla or hash brown.
Ingredients
Order
Fluffy scrambled eggs
Jack cheese
Pico de Gallo (a fresh-chopped tomato salsa)
House-Made Corn Chips
Succulent meat or veggies of your choice
Breakfast Quesadillas
Who doesn't love a breakfast quesadilla?! Perfect if you're on the go, we take a flour tortilla and sandwich your favorite breakfast fillings inside with Jack Cheese, then grill it to melted perfection.
Ingredients
Order
Soft flour tortilla
Filling of your choice
Melted Jack cheese
Coffee
Start your day with our beautiful freshly-brewed or barista-made coffee! Pair with your favorite breakfast menu item or grab one by itself!
Order
Flame-Grilled Chicken
Hand-rubbed with GYG’s delicious Guerrero marinade and char-grilled to perfection - our Spicy Grilled Chicken is served with a splash of GYG Hot Sauce to give it that extra kick. If you want to take your chicken to the next level, try it with our Smoky Chipotle Salsa or even our Habanero Salsa if you're looking for that extra spice kick!
Order
Flame-Grilled Steak
Packed full of juicy flavor and flame-grilled to perfection, our Flame-Grilled Steak, seasoned, cooked over open flame is the perfect addition to any burrito or bowl! We suggest adding our Smoky Chipotle Salsa for an extra hit of flavor.
Order
Sautéed Vegetables with Guacamole
Vegetarian? No hay problema! We quickly sautée only the best quality vegetables including bell pepper, mushrooms, corn and sliced onion. Better yet, it comes served with our fresh, house-made Guacamole too!
Order
Shredded Beef Brisket
We start by lovingly slow-cooking beef brisket until tender, then hand-pulling and seasoning with our Guerrero marinade to give it a deep and rich flavor. The result? Truly melt-in-your-mouth goodness! We suggest trying our Shredded Beef Brisket with our Roasted Jalapeño Salsa to add a mild kick, or our Smoky Chipotle Salsa for a smoky flavor.
Order
Seasoned Ground Beef
From Mexico to Guzman y Gomez, our Seasoned Ground Beef is full of flavor and family heritage. Try it in our signature $2.50 taco or as a filling in your favorite GYG menu item. Add pickled Jalapeños if you want an extra hit of flavor!
Order
Pulled Pork Carnitas
Good pulled pork takes time! Our pork shoulder is seared and then slow-cooked for hours until it’s so tender it falls apart. We hand-pull the meat and season it with our delicious Tomatillo salsa, adding our GYG Hot Sauce for the Spicy option. Our Pulled Pork pops even more with pickled jalapeños and our spicy Habanero Salsa, or try adding a bit of Smoky Chipotle Salsa if you want even more smoky goodness.
Order
Burritos
GYG's most loved menu item, and for a good reason! Enjoy a generous combination of delicious & fresh fillings, hand-wrapped in a soft tortilla.
Ingredients
Order
Flour tortilla
Fluffy white or brown rice
Succulent meat or veggies of your choice
Jack cheese
Black or Pinto Beans
Pico de Gallo (a fresh-chopped tomato salsa)
House-blend salsa
Fresh lettuce
Bowls
Want the delicious Mexican flavors of our burrito but feel like something without the tortilla? Try your favorite burrito in a bowl!
Ingredients
Order
Fluffy white or brown rice
Succulent meat or veggies of your choice
Jack cheese
Black or Pinto Beans
House-made corn chips
Pico de Gallo (a fresh-chopped tomato salsa)
House-blend salsa
Fresh lettuce
$2.50 Tacos
A hard-shell corn taco coated in GYG’s renowned Chipotle seasoning and filled with the perfect amount of Ground Beef, crispy Iceberg lettuce, and our signature Jack cheese! Take your pick of mild or spicy salsa for the ultimate kick
Ingredients
Order
Chipotle-seasoned hard shell corn tortilla
Ground Beef
Iceberg lettuce
Jack cheese
Nachos
Nothing says 'let's party' like nachos! We take our house-made corn chips and load them up with the filling of your choice, beans of your choice, Jack cheese and top it off with the freshest guacamole and Pico de Gallo.
Ingredients
Order
GYG's corn chips
Succulent meat or veggies of your choice
Black or Pinto Beans
Melted Jack cheese
Pico de Gallo (a fresh-chopped tomato salsa)
House-blend salsa
Guacamole
Nacho Fries
An amazing combo of two of our most beloved dishes, you simply have to try our nacho fries! Fries, melted Jack cheese, pico de gallo, sour cream, house-blend salsa, guacamole, and your choice of filling.
Ingredients
Order
Skin on Real Potato Fries
Succulent meat or veggies of your choice
Pico de Gallo (a fresh-chopped tomato salsa)
Sour Cream
Guacamole
House-blend salsa
Pickled Jalapeño (spicy only)
GYG's Hot Sauce (spicy only)
Cali Burritos
Fries in a burrito, need we say more? Our Cali burrito is a cult favorite for a reason, with our beautiful skin-on fries replacing rice, and sour cream and guacamole included. Nothing like a bit of California love!
Ingredients
Order
Flour tortilla
GYG's chipotle seasoned Fries
Succulent meat or veggies of your choice
Jack cheese
Sour cream
Guacamole
Pico de Gallo (a fresh-chopped tomato salsa)
House-blend salsa
Pickled Jalapeño (spicy only)
GYG's Hot Sauce (spicy only)
Quesadillas
Tricky to pronounce but oh so easy to eat! We take a flour tortilla and sandwich your favorite fillings inside with Jack cheese, then grill it to melted perfection!
Ingredients
Order
Soft flour tortilla
Melted Jack cheese
Filling of your choice
Enchiladas
Go the whole Enchilada! We take your favorite regular burrito and top it with salsa, sour cream, guacamole and melted Jack cheese to take it to the next level of flavor.
Ingredients
Order
Flour tortilla
Fluffy white or brown rice
Black or Pinto Beans
Succulent meat or veggies of your choice
Melted Jack cheese
Pico de Gallo (a fresh-chopped tomato salsa)
House-blend salsa
Guacamole
Served with corn chips
Salads
So fresh and so delicious, this is one salad you do make friends with! Freshly made Mexican-style salads, topped with your favorite GYG filling.
Ingredients
Order
Bed of mixed greens
Pico de Gallo (a fresh-chopped tomato salsa)
Cucumber
Carrots
Chipotle Mayo
Succulent meat or veggies of you choice
Soft and Hard Shell Tacos
Your favorite GYG fillings in either soft or hard shell tortillas - hand-held perfection! For even more flavor, try mixing and matching your fillings when you order 2 or more!
Ingredients
Order
Soft Flour tortilla or Hard Shell Taco
Succulent meat or veggies of your choice
House-blend salsa
Jack Cheese
Iceberg Lettuce
Pico de Gallo (a fresh-chopped tomato salsa)
Kids Picks
With smaller portion sizes and a simplified menu, our 'Little G' range is perfect for younger stomachs and taste buds!
Ingredients
Order
Little G Burrito
Kids Nachos
Kids Quesadillas
Kids Fries
Carrot discs

name: La Encantada
raw_text:
Menu – La Encantada
Skip to content (Press Enter)
La Encantada
Home
Services
Menu
Story
Reservation
Home
Services
Menu
Story
Reservation
Home
>
Menu
Menu
Imagine savoring a plate of handmade tacos, each bite a symphony of spices dancing on your tongue. The zesty pico de gallo adds a burst of freshness, while tender meats, marinated to perfection, take you straight to the heart of Mexico. Feeling adventurous? Dive into their inventive vegetarian options, where roasted veggies and flavorful sauces prove that plant-based eating can be just as hearty and satisfying.
Now, let’s talk drinks! The cocktail menu is like a treasure chest, filled with vibrant concoctions that sparkle as brightly as your evening. Think of a refreshing margarita – the kind that makes you feel like you’re lounging on a beach under a golden sun. Each sip not only lifts your spirits but perfectly complements the bold flavors of the food.
And who can overlook dessert? Picture a flan that’s so smooth, it practically glides off the plate. It’s that sweet ending that leaves you pondering how something can be so delicious yet light at the same time. You might even find yourself wishing for just one more bite, a sentiment we’ve all felt at least once while indulging in dessert.
Savor the Magic: Exploring La Encantada’s Enchanting New Menu
Picture this: you settle at a cozy table, the ambiance is warm, and the menu reads like a love letter to culinary creativity. Each dish tells a story, and every flavor dances on your palate. La Encantada has really upped their game with this new lineup, introducing a mix of traditional favorites and whimsical twists that will have you drooling. Ever tried tamales stuffed with wild mushrooms and truffle oil? It’s a flavor revelation that will compel you to order seconds.
What about their fresh take on classic enchiladas? Imagine vibrant, hand-rolled tortillas stuffed with herb-marinated chicken, slathered in creamy, house-made mole. It’s like wrapping yourself in a warm, flavorful blanket! And let’s not forget about those sides. The charred street corn is pure bliss, topped with zesty lime and a sprinkle of cheese that adds just the right kick, making it the perfect partner to any meal.
And, oh—the desserts! If you think you can skip dessert, think again. Their chocolate flan is so decadent, it feels like a hug in dessert form. Not to mention, the stunning presentation makes every bite a feast for the eyes.
A Culinary Journey: What’s New on the La Encantada Menu This Season?
Let’s dive into the star of the show: the seasonal offerings. La Encantada has infused their menu with locally sourced ingredients that make the dishes sing with freshness. For instance, their innovative twist on traditional recipes is a real game changer. Have you ever tasted a vibrant beet salad topped with house-made goat cheese and crunchy candied pecans? It’s like a color explosion on your plate!
But wait, there’s more! If you’ve got a penchant for savory delights, their new seafood paella will absolutely transport you to the shores of a sunny Mediterranean island. Imagine a medley of shrimp, mussels, and saffron-infused rice—a dish that feels like a warm hug on a chilly day. Each forkful invites you to savor the moment, making it hard to resist going back for seconds.
And let’s not skip dessert! They’ve rolled out a silky chocolate mousse that feels like you’re indulging in liquid gold. Pair that with a cup of their artisanal coffee, and you’ve got a match made in heaven.
Taste the Tradition: La Encantada’s Menu Delivers Authentic Flavors
Let’s dive into why this menu is a game changer. Every dish starts with quality ingredients—think sun-ripened tomatoes, hand-rolled tortillas, and cuts of meat that are marinated like they’re preparing for a family feast. It’s more than just food; it’s an invitation to experience authentic Mexican culture. Have you ever tasted a taco so delicious, it feels like a warm hug in your mouth? That’s what you get at La Encantada. Each taco is filled to the brim, bursting with flavors that dance on your palate—like a fiesta in every bite.
But don’t stop at tacos; their enchiladas are a chorus of cheesy goodness wrapped in flavorsome sauces that will make your taste buds sing. And if you’re looking for something to warm you up, their pozole is akin to a comforting blanket on a chilly day—rich, hearty, and packed with a blend of spices that makes each spoonful a little miracle.
Delightful Discoveries: Top Dishes to Try from La Encantada’s Latest Menu
One standout dish that you’ve simply got to try is the
Smoky Chipotle Tacos
. Picture this: tender, marinated meat tucked into soft corn tortillas, topped with a zesty mango salsa that’ll have your taste buds singing. Each bite is a fiesta of flavors, where the heat of the chipotle meets the sweetness of the mango—pure magic!
But wait, there’s more! Have you ever tasted something so good that it feels like a warm hug? That’s what the
Creamy Avocado Bruschetta
does for you. Imagine crispy bread, lush avocado spread, and a sprinkle of sea salt—all drizzled with fragrant olive oil. It’s the kind of starter that gets the conversation flowing and leaves you craving more.
And oh, don’t miss out on their
Cilantro Lime Rice Bowl
. It’s like a mini-vacation in a bowl—bright, fresh, and bursting with life. Picture the perfect balance of cilantro and lime dancing on your palate, complemented by your choice of protein. Whether you opt for grilled chicken or spicy shrimp, it’s an adventure for your taste buds.
Every dish on La Encantada’s new menu is crafted with passion and creativity, beckoning you to explore the depths of flavor and experience the culinary craft they’ve perfected. So, are you ready to dive into this delightful journey?

About the Business
Business owner information
Isidro H.
Business Owner
TTS Tacos & Tequilas brings the bold flavors of Mexico to the heart of West Town, Chicago. Our menu celebrates tradition with a modern twist—think sizzling tacos al pastor, cheesy quesabirrias, fresh house-made salsas, and rich mole that’s been perfected over time.

Join us for brunch, dinner, or happy hour and enjoy handcrafted cocktails featuring premium tequilas, mezcal, and fresh ingredients. The atmosphere is vibrant, colorful, and filled with the energy of Latin music and great vibes—perfect for date nights, group gatherings, or a casual bite.

We’re proud to serve the community with friendly service, authentic recipes, and a true taste of Mexico. Whether you’re stopping in for Taco Tuesday, weekend brunch, or planning a taquiza-style catering event, we’ve got you covered with sabor y corazón.

Thalaiva's Indian Kitchen
âThe Authentic Taste of Kongunaduâ
Chicagoland's First & Only Authentic Kongunadu Cuisine â Where Tradition Meets
          Innovation!
Explore Our Cuisine
About Thalaiva's
Authentic South Indian Cuisine Exquisite Dining Experience
At Thalaivaâs, we are passionate about bringing the rich and authentic flavors of Kongunadu cuisine to
              your plate. Rooted in the traditions of South India's Kongu region, our dishes reflect a culinary heritage
              known for its bold, earthy flavors and fresh, locally-sourced ingredients.
Our chefs use time-honored recipes passed down through generations, combining aromatic spices and
              wholesome ingredients to create a truly unique dining experience. Whether you're a fan of fragrant
              biryanis, flavorful curries, or rustic side dishes, our menu is a celebration of the Kongunadu spirit.
Come join us for an unforgettable taste of tradition, where every dish tells a story of our culture,
              history, and love for great food.
View Gallery
Kongunadu Cuisine
Where
            Tradition Meets Taste
Kambu Koozh
A nourishing porridge made from fermented pearl millet, served chilled with
                    shallots, green chilies, and curd. A KONGUNADU classic
Mutton Kola Urundai
A traditional Tamil Nadu delicacy, comprises spiced minced mutton balls,
                    deep-fried to golden perfection, offering a burst of flavors in every bite.
Kollu Rasam (Horsegram Lentil)
Traditional KONGUNADU dish which is so comforting during cold & cough.Horsegram
                    broth cooked with crushed spices & fresh garlic.
Arisi Paruppu Sadam (Lentil Rice)
A traditional KONGUNADU dish prepared with rice and lentil together along with
                    spices.Served with a side of papad, Ghee & pickle.
Paasipayuru Kadayal (Greengram Lentil)
A TRADITIONAL DISH FROM KONGUNADU. Whole Moong Dal cooked to perfection adding
                    aromatic spices, onion & garlic.
Road Kadai Kaalan
Crispy crunchy cabbage & mushroom fritters dunked in aromatic spices with onion
                    tomato gravy. A KONGUNADU delicacy

Menu
Starters
All appetizers are accompanied with homemade cilantro and tamarind chutneys.

Crispy whole wings marinated in our house spice blend, fluffed in our Tamarind Chutney
$10

$9

$7

$8

Tandoor Entrees
All entrees are marinated for 24hrs and cooked only after you order to ensure they arrive at your table succulent and juicy, as barbecue should be.
Tandoor Mix Grill Platter
A House Specialty. This combination platter allows guests to sample our Tandoori Chicken Boti, Shrimp Tandoori, and Seekh Kabab. Served with a side of our rich Tikka Masala Sauce.
$35
Assorted Mix Grill Platter
A crowd favorite. A combination of Lamb Boti Kabob, Kafta Kabob, and Murg Malai. Served with a side of our rich Tikka Masala Sauce. All meats are Zabiha Halal.
$35
Gluten free
Tandoori Chicken Boti
Succulent pieces of boneless chicken breast - slow roasted in the tandoor then charbroiled to perfection.
$21
Tandoori Chicken
Our famous marinated chicken is now available in three options. These entrees normally take 30 minutes to slow roast in our traditional clay oven (Tandoori Oven).
Chicken Legs
$21
Half Chicken
$25
Whole Chicken
$29

$22

$21

Cuts of fresh paneer cheese and an assortment of seasonal vegetables baked in the tandoor.
$21
Vegetarian

Boneless chicken breast marinated in a mixture of our special spices and cream, then slow roasted in the tandoor.
$21

Boneless white meat baked in the tandoor enveloped in our homemade buttery cream sauce. Our take on the classic butter chicken.
$20

$21

$21
Chicken Karhai
Tender cuts of boneless chicken braised in our savory onion and pepper-infused sauce, creating a rich and satisfying culinary experience.
$21
Frontier Chicken
Boneless chicken thigh marinated in a velvety blend of yogurt, freshly squeezed lemons, and our signature spice medley, then expertly sautéed with onions, tomatoes, and green peppers on a sizzling griddle. This dish promises a harmonious fusion of vibrant flavors and succulent textures.
$21
Lamb Saag
Tender cuts of boneless lamb simmered in our homemade spinach-infused sauce, delivering a delightful blend of freshness and richness. (R)
$21
Chicken Saag
Tender cuts of boneless chicken simmered in our homemade spinach-infused sauce, delivering a delightful blend of freshness and richness.
$21
Fusion
Designed by Faraz, all our fusion entrees are famous dishes from different culinary traditions reimagined.
Rib Eye Steak
A juicy cut of rib eye steak marinated and charred any way you like and serve with sides of mashed potatoes. (R)
$48
Penne Tikka Masala
Penne pasta sauteed in our homemade buttery cream sauce topped with your choice of tandoori chicken or tandoori shrimp.
$29
Tikka Masala Tacos (3 Tacos)
Guests' choice of Tandoori Chicken, Lamb, or Paneer marinated in our rich Tikka Masala sauce served on corn tortillas garnished with cilantro and onions.
$15
Tandoor Char Burger
Deliciously seasoned with a seekh flavored burger cooked on the charbroiled to your liking. Served with tikka masala sauce, onions, tomatoes, lettuce and a side of chaat fries. (R)
$23
Chicken Fajitas
Spiced Chicken Fajitas cooked with onions,
green peppers and fresh squeezed lemons.
$22
Vegetarian Treasures
All vegetarian entrees served with rice. Accompanied by raita and our famous achar.
Palak Paneer
(Also known as Saag Paneer)

Paneer cheese and spinach slow-roasted in a decadent, rich creamy sauce, offering a delightful harmony of textures and flavors.
$16
Vegetarian
Chana Masala

$16
Vegetarian
Mutter Paneer Tikka Masala

Available with or without Peas (Mutter)
$16

$16

Daal

$15
Vegetarian

Menu
Menu
Starters
All appetizers are accompanied with homemade cilantro and tamarind chutneys.
Tamarind Wings (3 pcs.)
Crispy whole wings marinated in our house spice blend, fluffed in our Tamarind Chutney
$10
Masala Ceviche
Shrimp, jalapeños, onions, tomatoes and cucumber topped with our famous chaat spice blend positioned on a seared papadum.
$9
Chaat Fries
One of our fusion creations, these curly fries are liberally dusted with a special blend of Indian spices.
$7
Vegetarian
Vegetarian Samosa
Light, flaky pastry stuffed with a mixture potatoes, peas, and savory seasoning. Two in every order.
$8
Vegetarian

Our Beef Samosas are created with light, flaky pastry stuffed with seasoned minced ground beef.
$8

Shredded Tandoori Chicken, side of Tikka Masala Sauce. Two pieces per order.
$8
Tandoor Entrees
All entrees are marinated for 24hrs and cooked only after you order to ensure they arrive at your table succulent and juicy, as barbecue should be.
Tandoor Mix Grill Platter
A House Specialty. This combination platter allows guests to sample our Tandoori Chicken Boti, Shrimp Tandoori, and Seekh Kabab. Served with a side of our rich Tikka Masala Sauce.
$35
Assorted Mix Grill Platter
A crowd favorite. A combination of Lamb Boti Kabob, Kafta Kabob, and Murg Malai. Served with a side of our rich Tikka Masala Sauce. All meats are Zabiha Halal.
$35
Gluten free
Tandoori Chicken Boti
Succulent pieces of boneless chicken breast - slow roasted in the tandoor then charbroiled to perfection.
$21
Tandoori Chicken
Our famous marinated chicken is now available in three options. These entrees normally take 30 minutes to slow roast in our traditional clay oven (Tandoori Oven).
Chicken Legs
$21
Half Chicken
$25
Whole Chicken
$29
Shrimp Tandoori
Luscious shrimp slow roasted in the tandoor.
$22
Tandoori Lamb Boti Kabob
Tender, boneless cuts of lamb slow roasted in the tandoor.
$23
Seekh Kabob
Freshly minced ground beef mixed with our special blend of house spices, then charbroiled on a skewer in the tandoor for a delicious smoked flavor.
$21
Paneer Tandoori
Cuts of fresh paneer cheese and an assortment of seasonal vegetables baked in the tandoor.
$21
Vegetarian
Murg Malai
Boneless chicken breast marinated in a mixture of our special spices and cream, then slow roasted in the tandoor.
$21
Karhai Signatures
Accompanied with a side of rice, raita, and achar.
Chicken Tikka Masala
Boneless white meat baked in the tandoor enveloped in our homemade buttery cream sauce. Our take on the classic butter chicken.
$20
Lamb Tikka Masala
Boneless cuts of lamb baked in the Tandoor oven and marinated in our homemade buttery cream sauce. (R)
$21
Lamb Karhai
Tender cuts of boneless lamb braised in our savory onion and pepper-infused sauce, creating a rich and satisfying culinary experience. (R)
$21
Chicken Karhai
Tender cuts of boneless chicken braised in our savory onion and pepper-infused sauce, creating a rich and satisfying culinary experience.
$21
Frontier Chicken
Boneless chicken thigh marinated in a velvety blend of yogurt, freshly squeezed lemons, and our signature spice medley, then expertly sautéed with onions, tomatoes, and green peppers on a sizzling griddle. This dish promises a harmonious fusion of vibrant flavors and succulent textures.
$21
Lamb Saag
Tender cuts of boneless lamb simmered in our homemade spinach-infused sauce, delivering a delightful blend of freshness and richness. (R)
$21
Chicken Saag
Tender cuts of boneless chicken simmered in our homemade spinach-infused sauce, delivering a delightful blend of freshness and richness.
$21
Fusion
Designed by Faraz, all our fusion entrees are famous dishes from different culinary traditions reimagined.
Rib Eye Steak
A juicy cut of rib eye steak marinated and charred any way you like and serve with sides of mashed potatoes. (R)
$48
Penne Tikka Masala
Penne pasta sauteed in our homemade buttery cream sauce topped with your choice of tandoori chicken or tandoori shrimp.
$29
Tikka Masala Tacos (3 Tacos)
Guests' choice of Tandoori Chicken, Lamb, or Paneer marinated in our rich Tikka Masala sauce served on corn tortillas garnished with cilantro and onions.
$15
Tandoor Char Burger
Deliciously seasoned with a seekh flavored burger cooked on the charbroiled to your liking. Served with tikka masala sauce, onions, tomatoes, lettuce and a side of chaat fries. (R)
$23
Chicken Fajitas
Spiced Chicken Fajitas cooked with onions,
green peppers and fresh squeezed lemons.
$22
Vegetarian Treasures
All vegetarian entrees served with rice. Accompanied by raita and our famous achar.
Palak Paneer
(Also known as Saag Paneer)

Paneer cheese and spinach slow-roasted in a decadent, rich creamy sauce, offering a delightful harmony of textures and flavors.
$16
Vegetarian
Chana Masala

$16
Vegetarian

Available with or without Peas (Mutter)
$16

$16

Daal

$15
Vegetarian

MENUS
Explore our Menu
Our menu features regional Indian cuisine and Indian-inspired Americana, all crafted using fresh, high-quality ingredients and made entirely from scratch. The menu is mostly gluten-free, with plenty of vegan, vegetarian, and keto options.
Kama also features a charcoal grill for smoky Indian BBQ. Try the popular Prime Ribeye, Chilean Seabass, tandoori mixed grills, and freshly baked naans.
﻿
Note: An automatic gratuity of 20% will be added to all parties of 5 or more

8 More Attributes
About the Business
Dhanteraz Indian Fusion brings a delightful blend of traditional  Indian flavors with a modern twist in the heart of Roscoe Village, Chicago. Named after the auspicious Indian festival of Dhanteras,  Our menu features a diverse selection of mouthwatering dishes crafted with fresh, high-quality ingredients and authentic spices. From classic Indian curries to innovative fusion creations, there's something to satisfy every palate. Picture this as a magical blend of traditional Indian spices and flavors, combined with modern twists that will tantalize your taste buds and leave you craving more. Step into our  inviting space and immerse yourself in the cozy ambiance, where warm hospitality meets culinary excellence. Whether you're a longtime fan of Indian food or new to the flavors of the subcontinent, Dhanteraz Indian Fusion promises an unforgettable dining experience.

NAAN WRAPS
Indian flatbread filled with choice of protein and
wrapped with kachumber, desi slaw, chaat, green mint
chutney, garlic yogurt, and cilantro
BOWLS
All bowls served with a piece of our freshly baked naan.
Tikka Bowl
Savory and mildly spiced. Served with pickled onions, kachumber, chana dal, cilantro, green mint and yogurt chutney.
Korma Bowl
Creamy and sweet. Served with watermelon radish, carrots, cilantro, and sesame/mustard seed drizzle.
Madras Bowl
Spiced coconut. Served with roasted corn, watermelon radish, carrots, crispy onions,and garlic yogurt chutney.
Vindaloo Bowl
Fiery and bright. Served with cabbage slaw, pickled onions, crispy curry leaves, chana dal, and garlic yogurt.
Naansense Salad
Fresh, period! Romaine, mesculine, kale, carrots, red onions, radish, beets, kachumber, cabbage, raisins.

Dessert Fees
We are incredibly grateful to guests who choose to celebrate milestones and special events at Basant! We look forward to making your entire dining experience memorable.
While we offer delicious house-made specialty desserts, we can also accommodate guests who wish to bring their own desserts, including cakes, for a $25 fee to be added to the final bill.  Our front of house staff will work with you on timing and presentation of the dessert at your table.
BASANT

Surcharge:
As a way to offset rising costs associated with the restaurant (food, beverage, labor, benefits, supplies), we have added a 4% surcharge to all checks. We do this in lieu of increased menu prices. You may request to have this taken off your check, should you choose.
A 20% gratuity will be added for parties of 5 or more.
**Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs, may increase your risk of food borne illness. Regarding allergies, there are no precautions we can take to ensure every item has been handled in an allergen-free environment by our purveyors, and are not able to accommodate guests where cross-contamination and airborne can trigger a reaction. We will do our best to accommodate mild allergies.

name: The Spice Room
raw_text:
Flavorful Authentic Indian Food In Chicago - The Spice Room Menu
Call :
(773) 360-8689
MENU
ORDER ONLINE
The Spice Room Daily Menu
Daily custom-made menus and "a-la-carte" Flavorful gourmet dishes
The Spice Room, delivered by Caviar
Taste the authentic Indian cuisine as it was meant to be. We pride ourselves in our uniquely spicy and full of flavor creations. Freshness you can taste. Spicy doesn't always mean hot. It means using the right spice to bring out a unique set of flavors. We invite you to take a stroll down the memory lane, with Spice Room. Our reputation brings you over and our recipes keeps bringing you back again-and-again.
Appetizers
Phone: 773.360.8689
Vegetarian Appetizers
101. VEGGIE SAMOSA (2)
Triangular savory deep fried turnovers with seasoned potatoes and peas
102. ONION PAKORA
Crisp batter fried fritters
103. GOBI MANCHURIAN
Indo Chineese classic, cauliflower florets, spring onions tossed in Manchurian sauce
104. KURKURE BHINDI
Thinly sliced Okra, light spices, batter fried
105. PAV BHAJI
Mashed vegetables, spices and herbs, served with 3 bread rolls
Non-Vegetarian Appetizers
201. KEEMA SAMOSA (3)
Spiced minced lamb with peas
202. CHICKEN PAKORA
Tender boneless chicken, lightly spiced chickpea flour, deep fried

Chicken winglets marinated in red chillis, spices and batter fried

Boneless chicken, yogurt, spices and roasted

Yogurt, spices and mustard oil

Introduced in 1965, boneless chicken, special spices, deep fried

210. SHRIMP PAKORA
Chickpea batter, cilantro, various herbs
Main Course

Chickpeas, blend of onions, tomatoes and aromatic spices

Cottage cheese, onions, bell pepprs, tomato and cream based sauce. (MUST TRY)

Mixed vegetables in tomato sauce with herbs and spices. A house specialty***

Potatoes mushroom, chickpeas with spinach & light spices

Onions , tomatoes, ginger  & spices
402. KADAI CHICKEN
Tomatoes and onions
403. BUTTER CHICKEN
Classic, chicken cooked in tomato based sauce made with fragrant spices, butter and cream
404. CHICKEN KORMA
A real delicacy, chicken cooked in ground cashew and creamy sauce
405. CHICKEN SAAG
Chicken with spinach
406. CHICKEN TIKKA MASALA
Great Britain's favorite, we present our exclusive recipe, tikka in a smooth and creamy sauce
407. CHICKEN VINDALOO
Succulent pieces of chicken in hot and spicy vindaloo sauce with potatoes, a favorite for those who like it hot

501. SHRIMP KORMA

Lamb Main Course

Some of our dishes may take some extra time to cook, we ask for your patience. Thank you.
A few of our dishes contains nuts and dairy products. If you or your party suffer from allergies, please let a member of staff know prior to ordering
We Deliver Within A 3 Mile Radius.
Delivery Charge is $3.00
"Incredible food and friendly service. The food is really flavorful and the kitchen is able to control the spiciness based on your preferences. Make sure you order the gobi manchurian and the lamb curry."
Joe Piehl
Google Review
Best Indian Restaurant The Spice Room
"Food and service were outstanding. Strongly recommend the cauliflower and okra appetizers.. all of the dishes have a solid amount of heat but maintain incredible flavor. We went in to eat during their first week of being open - the owner was enthusiastic about the food and offered our group several recommendations. We will definitely be back soon!"
Andrea Szerzinski
"This restaurant is exactly what our neighborhood needed. The service is incredibly friendly, and they make some of the best Indian food you'll find in the city."
Eric Benrus
Google Review
Best Indian Restaurant The Spice Room
"Incredible food, with very nice staff. A little bit price-y, but well worth it."
Tim Schauer
Google Review
"I had a very good time at Spice Room. The food was extremely tasty. The staff was kind and generous, with a great sense of humor. The owner asked if we wanted spice, we obliged, and I'm glad we did! The food was spicy without compromising taste. The Spice Room lives up to its name. I am so happy this place took roots in the neighborhood. Highly recommended, I'll be back!"
Kevin Mueller
Google Review
"Awesome food and staff. Very spicy without losing any flavor and the option to have less or no spice. Had the sag aloo and the spinach was super fresh. Easily rivals any Indian restaurant on Devon."
Chris Moirano
Google Review
"Exceptional food here & timely delivery ! 103 the Manchurian cauliflower was out of this world flavor! 104 Okra was excellent too I ordered delicious green sauce (cilantro & mild garlic not on menu)! 605 the lamb vindaloo was succulent, tender big juicy & incredibly delicious! It was perfect spice for me and exactly as described fiery hot! The garlic & potato nan were fantastic too! The Spice Room is THE BEST, authentic Indian restaurant food I have ever tasted, better than Devon Ave and other Chicagoland restaurants. I highly recommend and will order from here again soon! It's little pricey cuz best quality meat & spices & no bones, but really worth it!!!"
Sandy B
Google Review

name: Himalayan Sherpa Kitchen
raw_text:
Menu – Himalayan Sherpa Kitchen - Himalayan Sherpa Kitchen – 2701 W Lawrence Ave, Chicago
HOME
ABOUT US
REVIEWS
Review us on Google
Facebook Reviews
CONTACT
ORDER CATERING
ORDER ONLINE
Select Page
Himalayan Sherpa Kitchen MENU
Serving authentic Himalayan Cuisine in Chicago. Select from our sumptuous menu that includes mouthwatering Nepali, Newari, Tibetan and Indian delicacies.
VIEW OUR MENU
Call 773-942-6721
7
We Believe In Serving the Best Authentic Himalayan Food
We use fresh ingredients to make our food taste the best. Our experienced chefs believe in making customers happy by making the most delicious food with a quality of service that exceeds your expectations on every visit.
himlayan momo
We serve mouth-watering momo that are steaming hot with delicious achar on the side. If you are a fan of ‘Jhol’ Momo we also offer varieties of ‘Jhol momo’.
Tibetan Delight Sha-Bhaley
Mouth-watering delicacy stuffed with minced chicken meat and peas that has slow cooked in fragrant Himalayan spices and given a ghee (butter) rub
.
Thakali BHOJAN
Unique platter for one, with your choice of  meat or veg, Basmati rice served with fresh stir fried mustard leaves, tomato achar (pickle),vegetable curry,  daal (lentils) Papadum, yogurt and mouth-watering desserts.
Full Menu
MENU
Soup
Veg soup
-5.95
Chicken
-6.95
Khaja (APPETIZER)
Papad and Achaar:
Fried soybean with crunchy thin bread made of yellow lentil. (3.95)
Sherpa Garden Salad
: Very fresh prepared salad includes lettuce, carrots, tomatoes, cucumber tossed with Himalayan spices. (5.95)
Indian Delights, (Samosa & chutney) (2 pieces)Veg/Chicken:
Homemade pastry triangle filled with vegetables including potatoes, spring onion, peas and coriander. Served with a mint and yoghurt sauce.(5.95/6.95)
Tibetan delights (Sephaley
): Mouth-watering delicacy stuffed with minced chicken meat and peas that has slow cooked in fragrant Himalayan spices and given a ghee (butter) rub.(8.95)
Base camp potato
: Its chef special fries sautéed with Himalayan herbs and chef special  ingredients/Chhoila stye.(10.95)
Chicken pakora
: Minced chicken, green pea, golden fried with light batter. (7.95)
Aloo ko Achaar
: Boiled potato mixed up with fresh veggies(salad)   sesame and spices.(7.95)
Entrée
(Sherpa specialities)
Himalaya Sherpa special homemade Dumplings:
Minced vegetable or chicken marinated in Himalayan spices, stuffed in flour wrap and steamed to perfection. Served with special spicy sauces. (Option-steam/jhol(with sauce)/fried).(11.95/12.95)
C’ Momo:
C Momo is regular momo but dipped in a enriched hot and spicy sauce with fresh onion,tomatoes and green paper.(14.95)
Ting-Mo:
Very typical Tibetan steam bun made of flour, served with mustard leaf and special dipped sauce.(13.95)
Thukpa:
Noodles cooked with season vegetables with mountain spices.(Veg,10.95/chicken,11.95/shrimp,13.95)
Thenthuk:
Very unique homemade Tibetan  noodles with chicken and seasoned vegetables and mountain spices.(14.95)
Chowmein(Noodles):
Chowmein are stir-fried noodles and spices. The dish is popular throughout the Nepalese Diaspora and appears on the menus of most Nepalese restaurants.(Veg,11.95/chicken,13.95/shrimp,15.95)
Typical Nepalese delights
Chitwan ko taas:
It’s a very special and popular Nepal delights .the skinless bits of meat are marinated and shallow fried over a specially built thick iron griddle (tawa) until tender. It is served with puffed/Beaten rice,Bhatmas, green salad, and green chillies that add a piquant crunch and bit.(16.95)
Poleko masu
(Sekuwa):
Sekuwa is tender piece of meat tossed with  roasted cumin and coriander seeds enriched with lemon juice yoghurt and hint of Szechwan, in natural wood fire in traditional Nepalese country style. served with greens and tomato pickles.(chicken,15.95/goat 15.95)
Newari special(chhoila)
:
Grilled boneless chicken marinated in typical Nepali spices.Served with roasted beaten rice.
It is considered necessary part of the dies in big festivals among the newat community along with several other ingredients in Nepal.(15.95)
Phulaura (5 pieces)
Traditional crispy patties prepared from black lentils, potato, cabbage, chickpea flour, spring onion, spinach, and coriander blended in Nepalese herbs and served with a mint and yoghurt sauce.(9.95)
Goat Bhutun(For Special order only)-15.95
Healthy Himalayan, delights
Kwati (ideal protein) :
A curry of nine different beans cooked with ginger, garlic, cumin, chilli, fenugreek seeds and diced fresh tomatoes, onions and mustard oil.
Since, it contains varieties of beans, this
recipe
is loaded with proteins.(14.95)
Pumpkin curry:
Fresh Full of protein and hearty nutritious pumpkin curry,flavoured with mustard seed, fenugreek, ginger, salt and paper.(13.95)
Bitter gourd/karela
: Fresh bitter gourd with thick tomato sauce.Highly recommended for high blood pressure.13.95
Rayoko Saag:
Organic and fresh Mustard leaves (spinach) stir-fried with chilli, cumin seed and a dash of mustard oil and butter. 12.95
Aaloo,tama bodi curry
:
it is extremely tasty and very appetizing mainly for its slightly sour and pungent taste.
it
is a classic Nepali curry prepared with black eyed beans, potatoes, bamboo shoots and spices.
Tama
is a non-fermented bamboo shoot product which is really good for health.(15.95)
Jhaneko Daal:
Full nutritional
Yellow and black lentils cooked in traditional style and flavoured with Nepalese herbs and spices that have been stir-fried in vegetable oil.(12.95)
Jeera/Jimboo Aloo:
this
is very popular dish where potatoes cube tempered with
cumin
seeds/Himalayan herbs giving a slightly nutty flavour to the dish.(13.95)
Mukhya Bhojan (Main Course)
Kukhura ko Masu with bone (Mild Chicken Curry) :
Traditional Nepalese country cuisine prepared in aromatic Nepalese spices with onion, ginger, garlic and ground almonds.(17.95)
Manange Khasiko Masu with bone (Goat ) :
Traditionally spiced Nepalese style curry with your choice of tender   lamb or goat(with bone) enriched with the flavours of fenugreek, cinnamon, tomatoes, coriander and bay leaves.(18.95)
Chef signature curry(chicken/goat with bone
) : very unique and aromatic dish with his secret Himalayan  ingredients.(19.95/21.95)
Sumundra Khana (Seafood)
Jhingey ko Tarkari (Shrimp Curry)

Our very special and traditional Sherpa’s dish, with your choice of  meat ,Millet dough or Basmati rice serve with fresh stir fried mustard leaves, non veg curry, Jeera Aloo, ghundruk ko jhol, jimboo  daal (lentils) Papadum , chutney (pickle), and mouth-watering desserts.

chickpeas in a very thick and rich sauce.(14.95)

raw_text:
Menu - Nepal House On Devon Ave
Home
About Us
Menu
Catering
Order Online
Menu
Prices may vary with other online ordering websites and printed menus
Chicken Tikka Masala
$17.95
Boneless cubes of chicken roasted in a clay tandoor oven and folded into a creamy sauce with aromatic
spices.
Palak Paneer
$16.95
Delicately spiced creamed spinach cooked with fresh, homemade paneer.
Vegetable Samosa
$7.95
Cone pastry stuffed with a blend of herbs and spices, mixed with your choice of
topping and deep-fried in vegetable oil. Served with house special tamarind and mint/cilantro
chutney.
Chicken Makhani
$16.95
Makhani is an Indian word meaning "with butter". Therefore this is a dish cooked in a rich creamy sauce
made with butter or ghee, onions, tomatoes, mild spices.
Aloo Gobhi
$17.95
Fresh cauliflower and potatoes cooked to perfection with mild Indian spices along with ginge
Chicken Momo
$16.95
Steamed Nepalese dumplings, with minced chicken, mixed with a blend of aromatic spices.
Served with a special tomato chutney with a mixture of spices.
Chicken Vindaloo
$16.95
A highly seasoned and spicy curry made with boneless pieces of chicken cooked in a sauce of
vinegar, red chilies, garlic, and spices
Baigan Bharta
$17.95
Fresh eggplant roasted in a clay tandoor oven then smashed and marinated in a rich blend of Mughlai
spices and finally cooked over a low heat cream sauce to draw the richness of the spices.
Mix Pakora
$7.95
Mixed vegetables marinated and spiced in garbanzo flour and deep-fried in vegetable oil.
Chicken Madras
$16.95
Freshly-made savory coconut curry with madras masala and boneless pieces of chicken including a mix of several Indian spices.
Tadka  Dal
$16.95
Yellow lentils cooked in a traditional Nepalese wok with onion, ginger, garlic, & tomatoes
Garlic Naan
$5.99
Flatbread made with white flour, dry yeast, salt, water, a hint of yogurt, and baked in a clay tandoor oven with garlic on top

Tandoori Pakwans (Charcoal Oven Specialties)
An ancient method of cooking meats and baking breads. Food is marinated in a delightful, delicately spiced yogurt sauce and cooked in a clay oven (tandoor) over charcoal. This process develops an extremely seductive taste. Very lean and tender. Arrives at your table sizzling.

name: Chicago Curry House
raw_text:
Home - Chicago Curry House
Home
About
Menu
Order Catering
Chicago Curry House
A Taste of India and Nepal
Order Online get 10% discount automatically!
All You Can Eat Buffet EVERYDAY!!!!
10:30am to 3:30pm
$16.95 Weekday
$19.95 Weekend and Holidays
899 S Plymouth Ct, Chicago Illinois, 60605
Call us at (312)-362-9999
We are the lead Indian and Nepali Cuisine Caterers!
Allergy Warning:
Menu items contain or come into contact with more ingredients than listed. Please ask manager on duty for more information!'
Click Here To Order
Catering
Chicago Curry House is the lead caterer for Indian & Nepalese Himalayan Cuisine. Our professional team is very dedicated to helping our customers in picking the right items for the right event. We cater through many different platforms like Fooda, EzCater,  Grub hub,  & Others. Also, we provide catering services to many corporate offices, universities, weddings, and fundraising events. Contact us about your catering needs. We cater to parties for up to 1000 people and timing is of no issue.
Delivery Service
C
hicago Curry House is partnered with a very reputable delivery company to provide our service to customers across Chicago whether that be at your home, office, hotel, or convention. Our professional staff and drivers work extremely hard to deliver food on time while remaining at its optimal temperature. Simply click on the order online tab, place your order, and we take care of the rest.
All You Can Eat Buffet / Brunch
Chicago Curry House offers a variety of dishes at our All You Can Eat Buffet. With a selection of about 2 dozen delicious Indian and Nepalese Himalayan dishes, you will always experience a new flavor. You can stop by to eat at our buffet and tackle the rest of your busy day within a few minutes. Our delicious healthy food will make sure you have the optimal amount of energy and nutrients to have a wonderful day everyday from 10 am to 3 pm.
Weekdays: $16.95 with a limited selection of around a dozen items
Weekends and Holidays: $19.95 with our full extensive lineup of around 2 dozen items
Group Dine-In
With more than 100 seats available, Chicago Curry House has a variety of seating arrangements to appeal to your dining needs. From a small table of 2 for a lovely couple to a long table of 30 for an energetic group of office colleagues, our dining arrangements will suit your needs. Our seating area is extremely comfortable and has a very calm, elegant vibe that will make your dining experience unforgettable. Chicago Curry House aims to make every single diner satisfied and happy with their experience. We can accommodate all types of food preferences whether that be non-spicy, vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, halal, and etc.

View Menu

Take a sip of our signature drinks and enjoy a night of magic entertainment at Alhambra Palace.
View Menu
Our Story
ABOUT US
History & The Vision
Our History
Intrigued by the history and art of Alhambra, the eponymous palace and fortress complex of the Moorish monarchs of Granada in southern Spain, Dr. Nasar Rustom hoped to one day bring the culture, art, and splendor of Alhambra to the city of Chicago.
Over the course of several years and many trips to the Middle East and North Africa, Dr. Rustom amassed a large collection of artifacts to eventually display and furnish at his future restaurant.
In order to recreate the splendor of the original Alhambra, Dr. Rustom began commissioning artisans from Syria, Lebanon, Egypt, and Morocco to recreate the Moorish style of art for the hand carved wood furniture, sculptures, rugs, stone mosaics, arabesques, and crystal chandeliers that were to be found around the restaurant.
Our Vision
Intricate gilding framing doorways, windows, and hand painted tiles paneling the walls throughout the restaurant would exemplify the care and painstaking detail that Dr. Rustom wanted to recreate from the original Alhambra Palace right here in Chicago.
Since opening in 2007, Alhambra Palace has provided a unique experience of fine dining and entertainment to a diverse range of customers.Stepping into Alhambra Palace is a guaranteed experience for a unique evening of Middle Eastern / Mediterranean fine dining paired with exotic drinks.
Come for the food and stay for the amazing entertainment. Alhambra Palace features the best belly dancers and Middle Eastern singers Chicago has to offer every Friday & Saturday Night.
Banquets & Special Events
Host an Event with Us
Offer your guests an unforgettable experience! Alhambra Palace is a luxury venue in Chicago at unmatched rates.
Book a banquet room for your next event!

About the Business
Our Indian restaurant stands out by blending authentic flavors with modern convenience, ensuring every dish delivers the richness of tradition and the warmth of a home-cooked meal right to your doorstep. From handcrafted spices to locally sourced, fresh ingredients, each plate reflects our commitment to quality and authenticity. What sets us apart is our seamless delivery experience — catering to a wide delivery radius, ensuring your favorite meals arrive hot and on time. Whether you crave the comfort of creamy butter chicken, the vibrant spice of a biryani, or vegan-friendly options, we guarantee flavors that delight and service that exceeds expectations.

Data Macau
menjadi salah satu sumber informasi yang sangat dicari oleh para penggemar togel macau. Di dalamnya terdapat berbagai jenis data, seperti toto macau dan live draw macau. Ini adalah platform yang menyediakan hasil undian secara langsung. Toto macau 5D yang menawarkan pengalaman bermain yang menarik bagi para pemain. Dengan adanya fitur ini, pemain dapat memilih angka dengan lebih percaya diri berdasarkan data terkini. Adapun, live draw macau adalah sebuah acara yang ditunggu-tunggu oleh para penggemar togel macau. Dalam sesi ini, hasil undian untuk permainan togel macau diumumkan secara langsung. Ini memberikan sensasi dan keaslian bagi para pemain yang ingin melihat hasilnya secara real-time. Proses live draw macau dilakukan dengan transparan dan akuntabel. Para penonton dapat menyaksikan setiap langkah undian, mulai dari pengambilan bola hingga munculnya nomor pemenang. Dengan cara ini, semua peserta merasa lebih percaya diri terhadap integritas sistem yang digunakan. Momen live draw macau biasanya diadakan pada waktu tertentu setiap harinya. Banyak situs terpercaya menyiarkan acara ini secara streaming, sehingga siapa pun bisa mengaksesnya dengan mudah melalui perangkat mereka. Dengan mengikuti live draw macau 4D dan 5D, pemain tidak hanya mendapatkan angka-angka terbaru tetapi juga merasakan atmosfer kompetisi dan ketegangan saat menunggu hasil keluar. Bagi banyak orang, pengalaman ini menjadi bagian tak terpisamacauan dari rutinitas perjudian mereka di dunia togel. Setiap hari, result macau menghadirkan informasi terbaru mengenai angka-angka keluarannya. Pemain bisa memanfaatkan data ini untuk merumuskan strategi terbaik mereka di permainan berikutnya. Jadi, bagi banyak orang, akses ke data macau bukan hanya sekedar hiburan tetapi juga kesempatan untuk mendapatkan kemenangan besar melalui prediksi macau yang lebih akurat disini.

Chicken Special Kebab CSK ----- $ 16.99
2 pcs. Chicken tikka * 2 pcs. Reshmi kebab * 2 pcs. Chicken seekh kebab*2 pcs Tandoori chicken
Chicken Seekh Kebab  ----- $ 14.99
Ground chicken flavored with fresh herbs.
Tandoori Chicken Full ----- $ 16.99
Spring chicken marinated with yogurt ginger garlic and authentic spices and grilled in clay oven.
Lamb Seekh Kebab ----- $ 17.99
Ground lamb flavored with fresh herbs and spices skewered and cooked in clay oven.
Tandoori Chicken Half ----- $ 11.99
Spring chicken marinated with yogurt ginger garlic and authentic spices and grilled in clay oven.
Fish Tikka (Salmon)  ----- $ 16.99
Fresh salmon marinated with yogurt garlic and pieces and grilled in clay oven.
Shrimp Tikka  ----- $ 17.99
Jumbo Shrimp marinated in yogurt ginger garlic spices and grilled in clay oven.
Siri Special Tandoori Platter  ----- $ 19.99
Assortment of Tandoor Chicken, Reshmi Kebab, Sheek Kebab, and Shrimp Tikka.
Paneer Tikka  ----- $ 12.99
Cubes of paneer, bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes marinated with traditional spices and grilled in clay oven.
Mixed Vegetable Pakora ----- $ 7.99
Mixed vegetable with ginger, chilies and curry leaves fried with chick pea batter.
Veg Channa Chaat ----- $ 8.99
Channa Chaat (Chickpeas Chaat) is a healthy and delicious snack recipe for any occasion. This chaat recipe is ideal to serve to kids
Samosa Chaat ----- $ 8.99
Samosa Chaat is served by adding a plate full of peas or chole masala, mashed samosa with freshly cut veggie toppings and a dash of lemon goodness
Veg Spring Roll (4)  ----- $ 4.99
Seasoned Chinese vegetable roll wrap & fried to golden brown.
Onion Pakora ----- $ 7.99
Sliced onions/mixed vegetable with ginger, chilies and curry leaves fried with chick pea batter.
Mirchi Bajji (3 Pieces) ----- $ 5.99
Batter fried long hot pepper. Hot peppers cut and fried to golden brown.
Gobi Manchurian ----- $ 9.99
Crispy fried Gobi tossed in sweet and sour Manchurian sauce.
Chilli Gobi ----- $ 10.99
Gobi fried with diced onions and bell peppers in Chef's hot chili sauce.
Baby Corn Manchurian ----- $ 9.99
Crispy fried Gobi/ baby corn tossed in sweet and sour Manchurian sauce.
Chilli Paneer  ----- $ 10.99
Indian cottage cheese  fried with diced onions and bell peppers in Chef's hot chili sauce.
Veg Samosa (2 Pieces) ----- $ 4.99
Triangle shaped turn overs filled with sea salt potatoes and peas.
Bhendi Peanut Fry ----- $ 13.99
Freshly cut okra stir fried with onions, peanuts and traditional spices, tempered with cumin and curry leaves.
Paneer Tikka Masala ----- $ 13.99
Homemade cottage cheese with diced onions and peppers simmered in rich creamy tomato sauce.
Guthi Vonkaya        ----- $ 13.99
Baby egg plant stuffed with peanuts, coconut and sesame paste simmered in tangy spiced onion sauce.
Navaratan Kurma        ----- $ 13.99
A medley of garden fresh vegetables, dry fruits and nuts cooked in delicately spiced classic creamy cashew sauce.
Malai Kofta ----- $ 14.99
Cheese and cashew veg dumplings simmered in rich mildly spiced and rich, creamy onion sauce finished with fresh cream.
Kadhai Paneer  ----- $ 13.99
Homemade cottage cheese and diced bell peppers, onions and tomatoes tossed with fresh herbs and ground spices in Kadhai.
Tadka Dal ----- $ 12.99
A simple dish made with the combination of yellow lentils and tomatoes, tempered with mustard, cumin seeds and chopped ginger.
Mutter Paneer        ----- $ 13.99
Homemade cottage cheese and fresh green peas in a creamy cashew and onion sauce.
Palak Paneer ----- $ 13.99
Homemade cottage cheese cooked with fresh spinach, onions, tomatoes and ground spices with a touch of fresh cream.
Chana Masala ----- $ 12.99
Chick peas cooked with onions, tomatoes and finely ground spices to perfection.
Dal Makhani ----- $ 12.99
Mughal’s favorite dish. Black lentils slow cooked on charcoal flame overnight, flavored with ginger and fenugreek leaves, finished with rich cream.
Butter Paneer ----- $ 13.99
Homemade cottage cheese cooked in rich creamy tomato sauce with fresh cream.

Traditional Indian cuisine, besides the vegetables and rice, also consists of bread, which we
bake in our specially-imported clay oven. We will be glad to assist you with your selections
as certain breads compliment each dish.

Each is served with Basmati Rice and Nan

Shuruvaat (Vegetarian Appetizers)
All appetizers are served with both hot and sweet chutney. Our hot chutney is made of
fresh coriander, mint, green peppers, onions & fresh lemon juice blended together with a
variety of imported spices. The sweet chutney is made with tamarind, brown sugar and
spices. Together, these chutneys offer a perfect balance of sweet and spicy to complement
any of our delicious appetizers.

Platter of samosa, paneer pakora, vegetable pakora onion pakora and aloo tikki

Tandoori Specials
Tandoori is an ancient Indian style of cooking various kinds of traditional dishes. The
food is prepared in a clay oven, which is heated by charcoal and an open pit fire. The
combination of the freshly ground spices and the smoky flavor makes these dishes unique
to Indian cuisine.

A sampler of tandoori favorites including tandoori chicken, malai chicken, chicken tikka Tandoori Royal Platter *

About us
Good Food can lift your mood in just seconds! Try out the Indian food at India Foodie Lounge in Palatine, IL. Here we offer you the chance to taste authentic and traditional Indian delicacies that include 
delicious paneer tikka masala, scrumptious chicken biryani, and many more dishes. These dishes have great taste and will mesmerize you. You should try these delicious dishes once when you’re in 
Palatine, IL.

OUR KITCHEN
Embark on a sensory adventure as our kitchen comes to life with the aromatic spices and vibrant colors of Indian cooking. About the Business
I-Cafe serves Turkish food.  Authentic Turkish Food are made from scratches in our kitchen.  Popular menu items are doner kebab, Adana Kebab, Kofte Kebab,  grilled chicken wing.  Also Pide, lahmacun are another our specialities!!   Great deals of Lunch specials ($6.99-$8.99) served from 11am until 3pm Mon.- Fri.!  Enjoy our authentic Turkish Tea, homemade desserts and breads and much more!  Everything is Halal and our place is alcohol-free, NOT BYOB!!

(Ideal protein) :

$13.95

:
it is extremely tasty and very appetizing mainly for its slightly sour and pungent taste.it is a classic Nepali curry prepared with black eyed beans, potatoes, bamboo shoots and spices tama  is a non-fermented bamboo shoot product which is really good for health.
$13.95
Pumpkin Curry:
Fresh Full of protein and hearty nutritious pumpkin curry, flavored fenugreek, ginger, salt and paper.
$13.95

typical black lentil simmered and tempered with ginger, tomatoes and herbs.

SHERPA NON-VEG DINNER COMBO

TRADITIONAL MAIN
We have utmost respect for typical, traditional and authentic food. We are proud that our experienced chefs can prepare the traditional dishes with authentic taste exactly at they should be. No fusion business.
CHICKEN SPECIALTIES
RATO BHALE TARKARI
Traditional Nepalese country cuisine prepared in aromatic Nepalese spices with onion, ginger, garlic and himalayn spices.
HIMALAYAN GOAT MASALA

$15.95
Butter chicken :

If you have a food allergy or special dietary requirement, please inform a member of our staff and we will do our best to accommodate you.All of our dishes are garnished with fresh coriander herbs.We also serve a wide variety of traditional Indian dishes including Korma, Madras, Vindaloo, Masala, Pasanda and Biriyanis. Please ask your waiter for details and suggestion.

Our promise to you
30-day money back guarantee
HugeDomains provides a 100% satisfaction guarantee on every domain name that we sell through our website. If you buy a domain and are unhappy with it, we will accept the return within 30 days and issue a full refund – no questions asked.
Quick delivery of the domain
In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
Safe and secure shopping
Your online safety and security is our top priority. We understand the importance of protecting your personal information.
We protect your information through SSL encryption technology, providing the safest, most secure shopping experience possible. Additionally, you may checkout with PayPal or Escrow.com.
FAQs
See more FAQs
How do I transfer to another registrar such as GoDaddy?
Yes, you can transfer your domain to any registrar or hosting company once you have purchased it. Since domain transfers are a manual process, it can take up to 5 days to transfer the domain.
Domains purchased with payment plans are not eligible to transfer until all payments have been made. Please remember that our 30-day money back guarantee is void once a domain has been transferred.
For transfer instructions to GoDaddy, please
click here
.
How do I get the domain after the purchase?
Once you purchase the domain we will push it into an account for you at our registrar, NameBright.com, we will then send you an email with your NameBright username and password. In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
What comes with the domain name?
Nothing else is included with the purchase of the domain name. Our registrar NameBright.com does offer email packages for a yearly fee, however you will need to find hosting and web design services on your own.
Do you offer payment plans?
Yes we offer payment plans for up to 12 months.
See details
.
How do I keep my personal information private?
If you wish the domain ownership information to be private, add WhoIs Privacy Protection to your domain. This hides your personal information from the general public.
To add privacy protection to your domain, do so within your registrar account. NameBright offers WhoIs Privacy Protection for free for the first year, and then for a small fee for subsequent years.
Whois information is not updated immediately. It typically takes several hours for Whois data to update, and different registrars are faster than others. Usually your Whois information will be fully updated within two days.

About the Business
Established in 1996. Tahoora - Truly, A Sweet Experience

Tahoora Sweets and Bakery on Devon Ave., Chicago, IL.

It was established in 1996 with a vision to provide the people of our community in Chicago with the taste of the sub-continent, by not only freshly made sweets, snacks and bakeries, but also making sure of pure and clean products. Hence it was named Tahoora, which means Pure and Clean.

By the grace of Allah since its inception, it has won an enviable reputation among the community of the Indian sub-continent, not only in Chicago, but also all over United States and in Canada. It's a household name now.

Today Tahoora is not only confined to the limits of sweets, snacks and bakeries but has added many new savory to the ever growing menu, to name a few new and very popular for its delicious and mouth-watering items are pizzas, burgers, bun-kababs, the favorite of all, week-end special halwa-puri, falooda and kulfi.

Hopefully you too will have a truly sweet experience.

raw_text:
