Main Menu
HOME
ABOUT US
Menu Toggle
CONTACT
MENUS
Menu Toggle
APPETIZERS
ENTREES
DRINKS AND DESSERTS
LIMITED-TIME SPECIALS
CATERING
STORIES
MICHELIN GUIDE
Entrees
Entrees
DOL SOT BI BIM BAP
Nut-free and gluten-free.
Korean Rice Bowl made with broccoli, smoked tofu, mung bean sprouts, spinach, zucchini, carrot, sliced mushroom, leek, and brown rice in a hot stone bowl.
Served with spicy Korean soy sauce orgochujang.
ROASTED SESAME MISO RAMEN
Nut-free
This umami broth is made with our house-made dashi. Served with Japanese ramen wheat noodles and topped with crispy fresh tofu skin, lightly seasoned mung bean sprouts, and buttered corn.
Garnished with roasted seaweed and scallions.
BURMESE NOODLE SALAD
Soy-free. Can be gluten-free with Kya Xan Thoke rice noodles.
Hearty noodle salad with refreshing flavors and textures. Choice of Khauk Swe wheat noodles or Kya Zan rice noodles, cilantro, garlic, shredded cabbage, and carrots. Served with tamarind and lime oil dressing and garnished with fried shallots.
Extra spicy upon request
NOBLE BURGER
Nut-free
Our house-made burger patty (oat, brown rice, onion, and TVP*) is served with tomato, lettuce, onion, pickle, ketchup and our house-made mayo.
Choice of side salad, potato fries, or sweet potato fries.
Add our house-made vegan cheese.
Add bacon
WALNUT SHRIMP
Crispy battered vegan shrimp tossed in house-made creamy sauce with toasted walnuts. Served with steamed broccoli and brown rice.
BANH MI
Nut-free
Vietnamese-style baguette sandwich with smoked TVP* and onions, house-made pickled daikon and carrots, cucumbers, jalapeno, and cilantro.
Choice of our house-made mayo or spicy mayo.
SPAM MI
Vegan Spam Sandwich. Your taste buds will thank you for the savory flavor of vegan spam that is enhanced with our house-made slaw, tomato, lettuce, and cucumber. All drizzled with our house-made mayo.
SWEET & SOUR CAULIFLOWER
Nut-free and sesame-free. Can be gluten-free, onion-free, and garlic-free upon request.
Crispy cauliflower florets are tossed in a tang and sweet sauce. Served with red and green peppers, onions, pineapples and cilantro. Choice of brown rice or quinoa.
Option for sautee cauliﬂower is available
Add Non-GMO soy protein for additional cost (not gluten-free).
KINGWICH
Nut-free.
Crispy fried mushroom sandwich. Organic King Trumpet mushrooms seasoned and coated with our chef’s secret recipe. Crispy outside and so juicy on the inside. Served with tomato and our house-made slaw.
Choice of side salad, potato fries, or sweet potato fries.
GOLDEN YUBA FRIED RICE
Nut-free. Can be gluten-free, onion-free, garlic-free, and sesame-free upon request.
Stir fried brown rice with cabbage, carrots, broccoli, zucchini, and bean sprouts. lightly seasoned and served with crispy pan-fried Yuba (tofu skin) and garnished with special soy sauce and scallions.
RUN AWAY POTATO
Nut-free and sesame-free.
Spicy potato stew. A vegan version of traditional and nutritious Korean dish Gamjatang. Potatoes, carrots, leeks, mush-room chunks, and sliced TVP* with distinct ﬂavors and spiciness. Served in a hot stone bowl with brown rice.
MUSHROOMS WONDERLAND
Gluten-free, nut-free, soy-free, sugar-free, and sesame-free.
Kale and broccoli sautéed with shiitake mushroom, king oyster mushroom, bunapi mushroom, onion, and garlic. Served with quinoa and garnished with cilantro. Extra spicy with our house-made chili upon request.
TOM KA NOODLES
Nut-free and sesame-free.
Traditional Thai noodle soup with a savory mild-spice coconut broth. Seasoned with lemongrass, lime juice, galangal, and kaﬃr lime leaves. Served with rice noodles, broccoli, carrots, baby corn, onions, mushrooms, and vegan shrimp. Garnished with cilantro.
TONKOTSU RAMEN
A rich and complex plant-based tonkotsu broth. Served with Japanese ramen wheat noodles and topped with vegan bacon, shiitake mushrooms, bok choy, buttered corn, and bean sprouts. Garnished with roasted seaweed and green onion.
(Entrees Continued)
GRACE’S TERIYAKI
Nut-free.
Traditional Japanese Teriyaki with a sweet glaze. Pan fried non-GMO soybean protein with special house-made teriyaki sauce. Served with brown rice and a side salad with Asian vinegar dressing. Nut-free.
Add extra protein
GOLDEN BREEZE
Can be nut-free without peanuts.
Vietnamese-inspired noodle salad (Bun-rice vermicelli). Golden rolls and grilled TVP*, lettuce, cucumber, mint, mung bean sprouts, house-made fermented daikon and carrots. Garnished with peanuts. Special trait of Bun is an adequate sweet and sour taste of our house-made sauce.
SPICY B.B.Q.
Nut-free
TVP*, cabbage, green and red pepper, broccoli, ground ginger with our house-made Korean spicy sauce. Served with brown rice and green leaf lettuce.
KOREAN B.B.Q.
Nut-free. Can be onion-free, garlic-free, and sesame-free.
TVP*, broccoli, onion, and garlic. Served with brown rice and green leaf lettuce.
LAKSA
Nut-free, sesame-free, sugar-free without vegan shrimp.
Malaysian Spicy Noodle Soup. Choice of rice noodles or wheat noodles. Served with onions, green beans, tofu “pocket” and vegan shrimps**, in a coconut curry broth. Garnished with fried shallots.
HEAVENLY CURRY
Gluten-free, nut-free, sugar-free, soy-free, oil-free, and sesame-free.
House-made curry. Butternut squash, sweet potato, chickpea, lentils, coriander seeds, lemongrass, ginger, onion, garlic, turmeric, coconut milk, red peppers, and peas. Served with brown rice.
MAMA’S LOVE
Nut-free. Can be gluten-free, sesame-free, onion-free, garlic-free, and oil-free.
Cabbage, carrot, zucchini, broccoli, sweet potato noodles, red peppers, ginger, garlic, and mushrooms in a mild veggie broth. Served with brown rice.
CHOW MEIN
Nut-free. Can be onion-free, garlic-free, and sesame-free. Can also be gluten-free with rice noodles.
Malaysian style stir-fried wheat noodles with Bok choy, carrot, broccoli, zucchini, mung bean sprouts, and garlic.
Add vegan ham** and/or extra noodles
ROYAL PHO
Nut-free. Can be sugar-free, sesame-free, and gluten-free without Hoisin Sauce.
Traditional Au Lac Vietnamese noodle soup. Served with seasonal veggies, onion, mung bean sprouts, with our special house veggie broth. Garnished with Jalapenos and basil. Hoisin and Siracha on the side.
Add vegan ham*** and mushrooms (not soy-free, sugar-free or gluten-free).
KUNG PAO DING
Can be Nut-free without peanuts. Can also be onion and garlic-free.
Choice of fried tofu, king oyster mushroom, or non-GMO soybean protein in our house-made Kung Pao sauce. Sautéed with red pepper, green pepper, ginger, scallion, garlic, broccoli, peanuts, and hot chili. Served with brown rice.
Menu ingredients
*TVP = Low fat textured vegetable protein made from non-GMO soy flour. It serves as a good source of protein, fiber, and certain vitamins like B-12.
**Vegan shrimp = made with Konjac powder (konnyaku potato from Japan), vegetable root starch, vegetable seasoning, and paprika.
***Vegan Ham = made with non-GMO soybean protein and vegetables, mushroom seasoning, spices, black pepper, coriander, and basil powder.
Food Allergy Notice
All of our ingredients may not be listed on the menu. Please call to let us know of any allergies or dietary restrictions. We will do our best to meet any special requests when possible.  Substitutions made when possible and may require an extra charge.
Alice & Friends’ Vegan Kitchen is not an allergen-free environment. Due to the handcrafted nature of our menu items, and our use of shared cooking and preparation areas, we cannot assure you that our restaurant environment or any menu item will be completely free of any allergens.

About the Business
Welcome to Chennai Central! A chef-owned spot bringing the true taste of Tamil Nadu right here to Arlington Heights. From crispy dosas and fluffy idlis to spicy Chettinad curries and flavorful biryanis, everything is made with authentic spices and traditional recipes.

If you’re craving real South Indian comfort food, this is the place. Fresh, bold flavors, warm hospitality, and 100% authentic Tamil Nadu cuisine—just like home.

PLEASE NOTE
*white rice comes with all protein dishes, except noodles
*one of each sauce comes with each order (two for larger orders)
please ask if you'd like
*utensils/ chopsticks
*extra white rice- $1
*extra sauces (hot mustard, soy, sweet & sour, chili oil)-$1
ALLERGY KEY
G: contains gluten
SH: contains shellfish (mainly oyster sauce)
FF: contains fin fish
TN: contains tree nuts
PN: contains peanuts
D: contains dairy
** although item typically contains this allergen it can be done without. Options to remove allergen are programmable via Toast online ordering.
For Example: Kung Pao Tofu (*G*) - contains traces of gluten, but can be done without. Lo Mein (G) cannot be done without gluten.
This menu only reflects if items actually possess the allergens in the dish. Anyone with an allergy that cannot tolerate cross-contact  in our fryers please call us with take-outs orders at 773.666.5143 ex 6. If you are dining in feel free to email us prior to arrival so we can put a note in your reservation and review your menu options ahead of time.
Happy Hour *everyday 5pm-6pm*

Shoyu - $18.99

Gyu-Kaku Japanese BBQ
Menu
Menu for Gyu-Kaku Japanese BBQ
Gyu-Combo To-Go
Gyu-Combo 2
The closest you can get to the Gyu-Kaku yakiniku experience without grilling the meat yourself. Customize your meal! Select two proteins as single or double portions, two marinades, and rice portion. Includes Miso Soup, White Rice, and a Set Salad.
1 photo
$16.00
Gyu-Combo 3
The closest you can get to the Gyu-Kaku yakiniku experience without grilling the meat yourself. Customize your meal! Select three proteins as single or double portions, three marinades, and rice portion. Includes Miso Soup, White Rice, and a Set Salad.
1 photo
$20.00
Gyu-Bowls To-Go
Crunchy Garlic Shrimp Noodles (GAH)
Crunchy Garlic Shrimp atop thick Japanese noodles stir-fried with sliced garlic, crunchy chili garlic oil, butter, and soy sauce. Topped with diced red bell peppers, chopped green onions, and sesame seeds. Mildly spicy.
3 photos
$16.00
Garlic Shoyu Chicken Noodles (GAH)
Thick Japanese noodles stir-fried with chicken, sliced garlic, butter, and soy sauce. Topped with diced red bell peppers, chopped green onions, and sesame seeds.
$15.00
Beef Sukiyaki Fried Rice Bowl (GAH)
Our signature thin-sliced Sukiyaki-marinated beef stir-fried with white rice, egg yolk, mushrooms, and sliced onions. Topped with diced red bell peppers, chopped green onions, and sesame seeds.
1 photo
$15.00
Beyond Beef Rice Bowl (GAH)
Our beloved Sukiyaki Bibimbap goes BEYOND. 100% plant-based Beyond Beef is marinated in our secret Sukiyaki sauce and stir fried with mushrooms, diced red bell peppers, and sliced white onions. Served over rice. Topped with chopped green onions and sesame seeds. Also contains butter and sesame oil. Picture for visualization purposes only. Beyond Bibimbap will arrive pre-mixed.
$15.00
Fried Chicken Karaage Rice Bowl (GAH)
Japanese Fried Chicken Karaage on a bed of white rice and shredded cabbage. Topped with Japanese Chili Mayo and chopped green onions.
2 reviews
3 photos
$15.00
Garlic Fried Rice Bowl (GAH)
Our Garlic Fried Rice features white rice stir-fried with egg yolk, sliced onions, sliced garlic. Seasoned with a combination of our Shio Soy Sauce, butter, sesame oil, and black pepper. Topped with chopped green onions and fried garlic chips.
13 reviews
8 photos
$12.50
Roast Beef Rice Bowl (GAH)
Premium roast beef on a bed of mixed greens and steamed rice. Topped with white and green onions, Signature soy-based barbecue sauce, and kuki wasabi.
1 photo
$16.00
Spicy Beef Rice Bowl (GAH)
Beef rib meat and rice dowsed in our signature Umakara Sauce and mixed with an assortment of bell pepper, shishito pepper, and corn, then garnished with sesame, green onions, and chili flakes.
$15.00
Umakara Beef Rice Bowl (GAH)
Thin-sliced Yakishabu beef marinated in our sweet & spicy Umakara sauce with sliced onions on a bed of white rice and shredded cabbage. Topped with chopped green onions and sesame seeds.
6 reviews
4 photos
$15.00
Gyu-Ramen To-Go
Spicy Beef Ramen (GAH)
Gyu-Kaku original recipe: Japanese BBQ meets Ramen! Rich kalbi beef soup and medium thickness ramen noodles topped with thin-sliced beef, boiled egg, green onions, spinach, daikon radish, and sesame seeds. Ramen noodles and hot soup are packaged separately to maintain their maximum deliciousness. Please reheat soup in the microwave (if necessary) and pour over noodles.
2 photos
$14.00
Tonkotsu Ramen (GAH)
Our Tonkotsu pork bone ramen comes with chunky, fatty braised pork belly Kakuni chashu and is topped with hard-boiled egg, chopped green onions, diced red bell peppers, and sesame seeds. Ramen noodles and hot soup are packaged separately to maintain their maximum deliciousness. Please reheat soup in the microwave (if necessary) and pour over noodles.
1 photo
$14.00
Goma Negi Shio Ramen (GAH)
Beef and shio-based soup with medium-thick ramen noodles and thick braised pork belly Kakuni chashu. Toppings also include boiled egg, green onion, and sesame seeds. Ramen noodles and hot soup are packaged separately to maintain their maximum deliciousness. Please reheat soup in the microwave (if necessary) and pour over noodles.
6 reviews
3 photos
$14.00
Gyu For All
Gyu-Family Meal for All
We have put together some of our fan favorites to create a well-balance meal that feeds four. Substitutions respectfully declined. Includes: 1x Gyu-Combo with 7 oz Yaki-shabu Beef in Miso, 1x Gyu-Combo with 7 oz Toro Beef in Sweet Soy Tare, 1x Beef Sukiyaki Fried Rice, 1x Garlic Shoyu Chicken Noodles, 1x Black Pepper Wings, 1x Fried Pork Gyoza, 1x Gyu-Kaku Salad, 1x Edamame, and 1x Napa Kimchi
2 photos
$84.00
MEGA Beef Sukiyaki Fried Rice
A TRIPLE SERVING of our Crowd Favorite: Sukiyaki Fried Rice with Beef. Serves 3-5 people. Our signature thin-sliced Sukiyaki-marinated beef stir-fried with white rice, egg yolk, mushrooms, and sliced onions. Topped with diced red bell peppers, chopped green Onions, and sesame seeds.
1 photo
$30.95
MEGA Garlic Shoyu Chicken Noodles
A TRIPLE SERVING of our Crowd Favorite: Mega Garlic Noodles with Chicken. Serves 3-5 people. Thick Japanese noodles stir-fried with chicken, sliced garlic, butter, and soy sauce. Topped with diced red bell peppers, chopped green onions, and sesame seeds.
$30.95
Appetizers To-Go
Fried Pork Gyoza Dumpling
Five (5) Fried Pork Gyoza Dumplings with Ponzu citrus soy dipping sauce
1 review
$8.45
Japanese Fried Chicken
Our secret-marinated Japanese Fried Chicken Karaage. Served with Japanese Chili Mayo and a wedge of lemon.
8 reviews
5 photos
$8.45
Black Pepper Wings
Dangerously addictive Nagoya-style Tebasaki chicken wings! Five (5) fresh-fried wings tossed in a sweet soy and black pepper sauce.
1 review
$10.45
Miso Chili Wings
Five (5) fried chicken wings coated in our sweet & spicy Miso Chili sauce.
3 reviews
3 photos
$11.00
Vegetable Spring Rolls
Four (4) Fried Vegetable Spring Rolls with Sweet Chili Dipping Sauce on the side.
1 review
1 photo
$8.95
Fried Cheese Wontons
Crispy fried wontons filled with cream cheese and green onions. Served with sweet chili sauce.
3 reviews
3 photos
$7.45
Takoyaki
Fried Octopus Balls! A street food classic straight from Osaka. Six fried octopus fritters drizzled with Takoyaki sauce and Japanese mayo. Topped with crushed bonito flakes and green onions.
5 reviews
10 photos
$8.95
Salads and Veggies To-Go
Edamame
Steamed Japanese soybeans. Lightly salted.
88 reviews
23 photos
$6.00
Gyu-Kaku Salad
Mixed greens, sliced cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and diced red bell pepper. Topped with a boiled egg (sliced), shredded daikon radish, and shredded cabbage. Served with Gyu-Kaku Dressing on the side.
25 reviews
16 photos
$9.95
Spicy Addicting Cucumber
Fresh cucumbers in Crunchy Garlic Chili Oil with a dash of Shio Tare, sesame oil, and sesame seeds.
11 reviews
3 photos
$6.95
Yuzu Shishito Peppers
Fried shishito chili peppers in our Japanese yuzu citrus sauce. Almost always mild.
$8.95
Napa Kimchi
Spicy, pickled Napa cabbage kimchi
1 photo
$7.00

Miso Soup
A comforting cup of our classic miso soup with seaweed, tofu, and chopped green onions.

S'Mores Milk Chocolate

Enjoy our original Sweet Soy Sauce at home! Use it on your delivery/takeout order or bring a Japanese flair to your next backyard BBQ! Soy sauce, pear juice, and ginger are three of the secret ingredient that we can share with you. Only available at Gyu-Kaku. Gluten Free

raw_text:
Xi'an Cuisine | 769 West Jackson Boulevard Chicago | Order Online
Home

About us
Home

Locations
Parking
Contact
About Us
Taste of Xi'an
Authentic Cuisine
Order Online
VIEW MENU
Amazing Food
Fresh Ingredients
Order Online
VIEW MENU
Featuring
Healthy Options
Amazing Food
We Deliver
Friendly Staff
Catering
Three Locations
We offer our services in three locations that cater to their specific customers. The two locations are in Chicago Chinatown and West Loop and 3rd location is in Naperville, IL. We only serve the freshest food in the town! See our happy customer reviews on Google and come try for yourself.
View Locations
Passion of Quality
We invest in quality ingredients to ensure our customers get the great taste we’re famous for because we believe that you deserve the best. Our secret ingredient is passion. Everyone on our team is passionate about making your time with us as great as it can be – from start to finish. We are proud to be the providers of the best quality Xi'an food in the town.
View Menu
Fresh Ingredients
We pick ingredients carefully and use only the freshest and natural ones to prepare every dish, and have been trying to cook them in a healthier way to provide the most nutritious food. Much attention has been attached to ensure you a cozy and inviting ambiance where you could enjoy not only the great meal but also the authentic atmosphere because we believe that you deserve the best.
Order Online
Hand-stretched Noodles
A specialty from the North of China, Lamian, made by twisting, stretching and folding the dough into strands, using the weight of the dough. Our noodles are stretched on-site inside our kitchen. Come and try our fresh stretched noodle. You will not be disappointed.
View Menu
Discover Our
BEST FOOD EXPERIENCE
About Us
Popular street foods of Xi’an, variety of Chinese American cuisine, and authentic Szechuan dishes, we also serve liquor , cocktail , wines, Martini, Mojito, margaritas, Beer, Sake and Boba tea , Fruit Tea and Real fruit Smoothies. We pride ourselves on our charming and boutique setting in three locations offering a warm and inviting atmosphere for those wishing to indulge in our culinary delicious delights.
Friendly Staff
If you are coming by yourself, on a date or enjoying a night out with friends, we have it all! Each location offers unique food and menu to better serve you. We will greet you with the warmest welcome, whether you are a habitual patron or come for the first time. We have made painstaking efforts to create the tidiest and cleanest place, and guarantee you with friendly and timely service. All of your demands and feelings will be cared in our restaurant.
Serving Hungry Eaters
At our eatery, we cater to both local and distant customers with a dynamic and evolving menu. Our commitment to utilizing seasonally fresh ingredients elevates your dining experience. Every dish is crafted with utmost care, using only the finest hand-picked ingredients. We value your feedback and are eager to learn about your favorite dishes. Contact us to share your thoughts.
Connect us

About the Business
Our business is experienced in making our customers feel like they are part of a big family. Our chef for the Chinese Cruisine is known for his General Tso's Chicken--sizzling hot, tender, and juicy. A loyal customer from a previous restaurant (under the same chef) will add that the chef's Garlic Chicken never gets old--even after 20 plus years of bi-weekly orders of the same dish! Much of our dishes are labor-intensive and requires long hours of behind the scenes preparation so we hope you enjoy the food as much as we enjoy creating them! Ultimately, we hope that each dish brings our customers joy!

"Best Asian Cuisine"

"Very Best Restaurants"
- Thrillist
River North Chicago
Menu
Sunda New Asian is an award-winning restaurant that brings a modern, innovative twist to Southeast Asian cuisine. Our menu celebrates the rich culinary traditions of countries like Japan, Thailand, Vietnam, the Philippines, China, and beyond. From expertly crafted sushi and dim sum to flavorful noodles, rice dishes, and salads, every dish is a creative reimagining of time-honored Asian classics. We pride ourselves on sourcing only the finest ingredients from around the world, ensuring every dish is crafted with the highest quality produce, seafood, and meats for a truly exceptional dining experience.

name: Golden Bull Restaurant
raw_text:
Home - Golden Bull
Skip to content
Search for:
Home
About Us
Contacts
Chinatown, Chicago, IL
Golden bull
See MENU & Order
Table Reservation
Chinatown, Chicago, IL
Golden bull
See MENU & Order
Table Reservation
Freshly Made
Golden Bull, freshness defines our authentic Chinese restaurant experience in Chicago’s vibrant Chinatown. Our dishes are meticulously crafted with handpicked ingredients, ensuring a burst of flavor in every bite.
Pure ingredients
We’re dedicated to using only the purest ingredients. From fresh vegetables to quality meats, each dish is crafted with care and integrity. Experience authentic Chinese cuisine at its finest, with flavors that speak for themselves, only at Golden Bull.
Made with love
Our chefs pour their passion into each recipe, ensuring that every bite is infused with warmth and care. From traditional favorites to modern creations, you’ll taste the difference that comes from cooking with heart.
About us
Since 1992, Golden Bull has been a beloved fixture in Chicago’s Chinatown, renowned for our authentic Chinese cuisine and warm hospitality. Our commitment to quality is evident in every dish we serve, prepared with fresh ingredients and bursting with flavor. Whether you’re a local regular or a first-time visitor, join us at Golden Bull for an unforgettable dining experience that celebrates the best of Chinese culinary tradition.
More about us
Quality seafood
At Golden Bull, our fame rests on one thing: our exceptional seafood. Sourced from the finest waters and expertly prepared, each oyster delivers a taste of perfection. Whether you prefer them steamed or fried to perfection, our oysters will leave a lasting impression.
“Indulge in the flavors of tradition, crafted with passion and served with pride. At Golden Bull, every meal is a journey through the heart of Chinatown’s culinary heritage.”
– Golden Bull
Cooking from the heart
Every dish we prepare, we infuse it with passion, creativity, and a deep appreciation for tradition. From the sizzle of the wok to the delicate assembly of flavors, each step is guided by love and dedication.

274 McHenry Rd, Wheeling, IL 60090

About Us
Weâre blending our passion for making delicious food with our extensive knowledge of our cuisine to create authentic and 
        classic dishes for your enjoyment. We use the freshest, locally-sourced ingredients and promise to give your taste 
        buds something to be excited about.
Thank you for ordering directly from our website which helps us to provide the best service with a focus on 
        top-quality ingredients. Enjoy your next meal to go-you will not be disappointed!
We are located along
274 McHenry Rd, Wheeling, IL 60090
Our Menu
Special Offers
Available When You Order Online
Check Back For New Specials!
Order Now
Reviews
Julie Heeren
What a delicious lunch my friend and I had! We both tried the sweet and spicy chicken bowl and assorted Asian drinks. 
                Beautiful presentation! Service was great! Small, but very nice decor and very clean. Fair prices. If I lived closer, 
                I would order often. Located in a strip mall with easy parking.
TeKeesha Fisher
Ate here today on a holiday, July 4. Victor and Don were the two individuals working. We were greeted friendly. We ordered family 
                style, sharing two kimbop, beef bulgogi, ddeokboki, and steamed rice. Everything was served in good time and delicious. Best 
                bulgogi weâve had in the area!
Jessie Kirkland
Good sushi first time ever I will be. Back omg Had crab feast loved it and tuna and Kimbop chicken veggie fried rice delicious will 
                be back when around here Everything is fresh and made to order love it
Lindsay Corcoran
I was blown away by the food and service at Kimbop! Between the fried chicken and Godzilla roll, I can honestly say it was it was 
                some of the tastiest food I have had. The vibe inside the restaurant is cozy and laid back. Perfect for a chill date night or quick 
                bite to eat.
Dimitri GG
First time in this place and what a delight! Customer service is top notch, very attentive and caring. Special rolls are 
                large and delicious. Looking forward to come back to check out other items on the menu!
Jane
We ordered a tray of various kimbop and boneless fried chicken for our grandson's first birthday. Everyone loved the food! 
                The service was wonderful and we would highly recommend them!

Welcome to Peking Chinese Food Restaurant, Chicago
Delicious Chinese Food For Online Order, Eat In, Take Out, Illinois
Located at 129 West North Ave., Chicago, Illinois, our restaurant offers a wide array of fine Chinese dishes, 
ranging from traditional Chinese dishes such as General Tso's Chicken, Sesame Chicken, Happy Family to new 
style entrees such as 
Bean Curd w. Mushroom, Steamed Mixed Vegetables, Peking Duck and Szechuan Shrimp.
Try our food and service today. Come in during our lunch hour (10:00 am - 3:00 pm) for a Lunch Special or during evenings for a delicious Chinese dinner. You can also online order your favorite Chinese Food for take out or delivery. Our goal at Peking Chinese Food is to provide an unforgettable dining experience for all our patrons..

Cantonese Restaurant
Cantonese Restaurant
If you’ve been looking for a Cantonese restaurant that serves authentic Chinese food, then your search is over! At Phoenix Restaurant, we have a large, extensive menu of dishes all made with fresh ingredients. There’s something for everyone to enjoy! We happily serve groups both large and small. Our family restaurant gives you the best of both worlds, offering both a comfortable atmosphere and a fine dining experience, along with a view of the Chicago skyline. Come dine with us for a great meal and an experience you won’t forget! For authentic Cantonese food in Chicago, IL, call (312) 328-0848 today.

SILOM12 MENU
At Silom12, we pride ourselves on our beautifully executed, contemporary, yet authentic Thai cuisine. Our enthusiasm for the use of fresh herbs and spices, have inspired us to create our vegetarian Christmas banquet for a minimum of two, the very best of authentic Thai cuisine.
View full menu
HOURS
Monday-Thursday 12pm-9pm.
Friday - Saturday 12pm-10pm.
Sunday 12pm-9pm.

Slight charge for buffet carry-outs.
We have a no waste policy; please only select items you are prepared to eat.
You will be charged to take out any buffet leftovers. Ask a manager for pricing.
Buffet sharing is not allowed.
Our delicious desserts are not included in buffet pricing but are offered at a special  price with your buffet. Please ask your server for available selections.
Beverages are not included in buffet pricing.
Buffet is priced based on the time you attend the buffet, not necessarily the time you arrive at the restaurant. If you attend the buffet across pricing periods, you will be charged the prevailing price for the current period.

About the Business
Business owner information
Chittanan S.
Business Owner
Dena Kitchen specializes in Thai cuisine. Many customers who are familiar with Thai cuisine may find our menus are very similar in many other Thai restaurants.  We do not serve alcohol though we accept B.Y.O.B.  We try to produce our food as much authentic as the food served in Thailand.  For those who are unfamiliar with Thai food, please come and try our menu, if you need a recommendation, you may ask our friendly waiter/waitress.

3LP Fried Rice
Created in 2020, Henry sold this fried rice with his famous viral bbq pork was sold out for 8 months while taking orders through instagram and personally writing the orders on hand drawn bags. This now classic fried rice has 3LP bbq pork, spam, and chinese sausage. The fried rice is fried with 3LP bbq sauce, fried garlic, fish sauce, green onions, and egg.

312.255.0088
Timeless fine dining.
Famed Vietnamese fare.
Perched on Oak Street in Chicago’s Gold Coast, Le Colonial exudes timeless sophistication. The beautifully designed space includes a palm-filled dining room and an elegant bar and lounge for mingling. The expansive terrace, open all year round, offers stunning views of bustling Oak Street. For a taste of something exceptional, a private chef’s table offers an unforgettable, intimate dining experience. Executive Chef and partner, Quoc Luong, features traditional Vietnamese recipes alongside contemporary takes on classic dishes.

deep fried soybean curds served with sweet chili and ground peanuts
Cucumber Salad
Spicy or Regular
THAI SALADS AND DISHES
Som Tum Thai
Shredded green papaya, garlic, chilies, green beans, peanuts, dried shrimp, tomatoes, fish sauce and tamarind dressing.
Nam Tok  (Beef or Pork Shoulder)
Shallots, scallions, cilantro, mint, toasted chilies, toasted rice powder, lime and fish sauce.
Pla Goong
Griled shrimp, herbs, lemongrass, lime leaf, garlic, chilies and lime.
Larb Gai
Ground chicken, lime, fish sauce, herbs, toasted chilies and toasted rice powder.
Grandma's Pork Belly
Marinated pork belly, thinly breaded and cooked until golden brown and delicious. Served with homemade Jaew sauce.
Grilled Pork Shoulder
Marinated pork shoulder grilled and served with homemade Jaew sauce.
Krapow Gai
Ground chicken, Thai chilies, garlic, green beans, and Thai Basil
Pad Kana
Stir fry Chinese broccoli with your choice of Thai chilies and garlic or oyster sauce.
Pad Pak Ruammit
Stir fry assorted vegetables with garlic
Grilled Shrimps
Just some grilled shrimps served with a Thai seafood sauce.
Crab Fried Rice
Fried rice, egg, scallions and 100% genuine REAL crab.
Thai Style Fried Rice
Our blend of seasonings, rice, egg and scallions. garnished with cucumbers, cilantro and tomato choice of chicken, shrimp or tofu.
Pad Siew
Wide rice noodles, Chinese broccoli, and Egg choice of chicken, shrimp or tofu.
Pad Kee Mao
Wide rice noodles, vegetables, Thai basil and Egg choice of chicken, shrimp or tofu.
SIDES AND DESSERT
Jasmine Rice

Catering
Join Our Team
-
No Job Opening
Passion of Quality
We invest in quality ingredients to ensure our customers get the great taste we’re famous for because we believe that you deserve the best. Our secret ingredient is passion. Everyone on our team is passionate about making your time with us as great as it can be – from start to finish. We are proud to be the providers of the best quality food in the town.
View Menu
Fresh Ingredients
We pick ingredients carefully and use only the freshest and natural ones to prepare every dish, and have been trying to cook them in a healthier way to provide the most nutritious food. Much attention has been attached to ensure you a cozy and inviting ambiance where you could enjoy not only the great meal but also the authentic atmosphere because we believe that you deserve the best.
Order Online
Fresh Ingredients
We pick ingredients carefully and use only the freshest and natural ones to prepare every dish, and have been trying to cook them in a healthier way to provide the most nutritious food. Much attention has been attached to ensure you a cozy and inviting ambiance where you could enjoy not only the great meal but also the authentic atmosphere because we believe that you deserve the best.
Order Online
Discover Our
BEST DINING EXPERIENCE
About Us
We pride ourselves on our charming and boutique setting in three locations offering a warm and inviting atmosphere for those wishing to indulge in our culinary delicious delights. The owner is hands on and involved in the day to day operation of the restaurant.
Amazing Experience
If you are coming by yourself, on a date or enjoying a night out with friends, we have it all! We offer a quiet and intimate sushi dining area and a full scale bar. It is really your choice! Stop in and experience something different.
Evolving Our Menu
Serving hungry eaters near and far, we're continuously changing our location and evolving our menu — always keeping our dishes fresh and unique. We serve you in 3 different locations.
Connect us

About us
Little Wok offers delicious Asian cuisine featuring Chinese and Japanese food. Great Sushi and fantastic dishes. We have three locations to serve you. We are looking forward to seeing you in any location near you.

The salad is mixed with a flavorful combination of lime juice, fish sauce, toasted rice powder, cilantro, mint, red onion, and chili flakes.

(Fried Rice)

Basil Fried Rice
$14.99

$14.99

Chef's Favorites
Our chef is craving for these!
Sweet Home Crab Curry
$28.99
Deep-fried soft-shell crab, stir-fried in a rich and creamy yellow curry sauce with crab meat, infused with fragrant spices. Bell pepper, Chinese celery, sweet onion, and evaporated milk.
Served with jasmine rice.
Pad Cha Cha
$28.99
Fresh fish, mussels, fish ball, cuttlefish, and shrimp stir-fried with our homemade curry paste. Aromatic flavors of Thai basil, kaffir lime leaves, and chili. Pepper corn, mushroom, carrot, onion and green bean. Served on hot skillet. Topped with basil and white pepper.
Served with jasmine rice.
Choo Chee Salmon
$28.99
Our homemade curry paste blended Thai spices, coconut milk, and kaffir lime leaves, salmon.
Served with jasmine rice.
Pad Ped Pia Duke
$26.99
Savory, aromatic cat fish stir-fried in our homemade red curry paste . Infused with finger root, fresh peppercorns, and fragrant kaffir lime leaves.
This dish captures the bold and authentic flavors of Thailand in every bite.
Served with jasmine rice.
Hangover 4.5
$28.99
Stir-fried homemade curry paste with seafood (fish, mussels, fish ball, cuttlefish, shrimp), thick rice noodles, bell peppers, fresh peppercorns, onions, kaffir lime leaves, galangal, fingerroot, and basil.
Served on a hot skillet, topped with basil and white pepper.
Scuba Diving Chicken
$20.99
Savor tender chicken slow-cooked to perfection in our housemade curry blend, featuring aromatic Thai herbs and spices. This unique dish is steamed under water, locking in rich flavors and creating a juicy, melt-in-your-mouth experience.
A must-try for those seeking a taste of authentic Thai culinary artistry.
Served with jasmine rice.
Captain Hook Catch
$28.99
A whole branzino, deep-fried to perfection and topped with a tantalizing spicy chili sauce made from chili paste, garlic, shallots, fish sauce, and palm sugar.
Finished with delicate julienned kaffir lime leaves for a touch of citrus essence and served with fragrant jasmine rice.

Menu
All our dishes are made fresh to order with care and love.
Some dishes take longer to prepare. Please be patient!
* Disclaimer!
These items are cooked to order and may be served raw or undercooked. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase the risk of foodborne illness. Our store offers products with peanuts, tree nuts, soy, milk, eggs and wheat. While we take steps to minimize the risk of cross-contamination, we cannot guarantee that any of our products are safe to consumer for people with peanut, tree nut, soy, milk, egg or wheat allergies.
New Seafood Items
Crab meat Curry with Wild Betel Leaves
34.99
Another version of our perfect bite;
Blue crab meat simmered in a creamy red curry sauce served with vermicelli noodles, snow crab legs, aromatic julienne betel leaves, and coconut cream.
Starters
Start your meal off right!
Thai Fried Fish Cake (5)
16.
A popular street vendor and appetizer food in Thailand.   Made of fresh fish paste, long beans, red curry paste and makrut lime leaves deep fried served with cucumber, sweet and sour sauce, and crushed peanut.
Chive Pockets(6) Vegan and Vegetarian
12
Crispy, Chewy chive cakes sprinkled with fried garlic. Served with a sweet and spicy dipping sauve atop a bed of pickled cucumbers and carrots.
Roller Satay with peanut lava sauce(Halal) (+$1 for beef)
13
A crispy creation of
halal chicken or halal beef
satay wrapped with spring roll skin filled with peanut lava sauce on bed of a pickled cucumber and carrot.
Add $1 for beef.
Fried Tofu (Vegan/Vegetarian)
11
Lightly fried tofu served with homemade sweet & sour sauce, ground
peanuts and cilantro.
Veggie Egg Rolls(3) (Vegan/Vegetarian)
8
Spring roll wrapper stuffed with carrots, cabbage, and grass noodles served with sweet chili sauce.
Crab Rangoon(6)
10
Fried wontons stuffed with imitation crab and cream cheese, served with home made sweet tangy mayo sauce.
Thai Firecracker Shrimp (6)
13
Marinated shrimp wrapped in spring roll wrapper and fried until golden brown and crispy. Served with homemade sweet & sour dipping sauce.
Lily Pads(6) (Vegan/Vegetarian)
11
Vegetable wonton wrapper wrapped around seasoned spinach and fried garlic. Served with sweet and sour soy dipping sauce.
Edamame (Vegan/Vegetarian)
8
Steamed soybeans in the pod, seasoned with Himalayan pink salt.
Betel Herb Wrap or Miang Kham (4) Vegan and Vegetarian
12
The traditional royal snack - A bite of the perfect combination of roasted coconut flake, with Thai herbs, ginger, shallot, roasted peanut, fresh Thai bird chili wrapped around with wild Betel leaves.
Prawn Hacao
12
Steam dumplings filled with prawns and bamboo shoots, seasoned with salt, pepper, and sesame oil, served with ginger soy vinaigrette sauce.
Zabb Halal Wings (4pc)
10
Marinated wings with fish sauce, spices, and fried for a satisfying crunch with a balance of sweet, sour, spicy and salty Thai flavors.
Emerald Fritters
12
(Vegan and Vegetarian)
Square-shaped chive cakes: crispy fried outside, savory inside. Served with sweet and salty soy-based sauce, with a kick of chili and top with fried garlic!
Grilled
Delicious, sizzling dishes, right off the grill!
Thai Crying Tiger (Halal Steak)
29
Thai style marinated halal steak grilled to perfection.  Served with Northeastern style dipping sauce (Jaew Sauce) served with a basket of sticky rice. (Recommended eating with Papaya Salad)
Dinner Salads
Salads so delicious, they will last the whole meal!
Papaya Salad (can be made vegan/vegetarian)
16
Famous Thai style papaya salad tossed in sweet and tangy dressing, tomatoes, green beans and topped with roasted peanuts. Shrimp Som Tum for $3 more
Swet corn Salad (can be made vegan/vegetarian)
16
A creative variation of the classic Thai salad, showcasing sweet kernel corn, tossed in a sweet and tangy dressing, complemented by tomatoes, green beans, and garnished with roasted peanuts. Adding be or shrimp is available for an additional $4.
Cucumber Salad (Vegan and Vegetarian)
8
Thinly sliced cucumbers and onion tossed in a sweet and tangy vinaigrette for a classic side dish.
Soups
A delicious meal, with meat, vegetables or both!
TOM YUM (can be made vegan/vegetarian)
12 (S)                           16(L)
Your choice of meat chicken, tofu, or vegetable cooked in hot & sour soup base, with fresh mushrooms, lemongrass, Thai lime leaves, garnished with cilantro.
TOM KHA (Coconut Soup)(can be made vegan/vegetarian)
13 (S)  18 (L)
Sliced chicken or tofu cooked in hot & sour coconut soup base, with fresh mushrooms, lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves & tomatoes garnished with cilantro.
Shrimp Wonton Soup
15
Clear broth soup with shrimp wrapped in a wonton and bok choy. Add egg noodle for $2.
Noodles
Many noodles, many flavors! Choice of chicken. tofu. mixed vegetables, beef(add $2), shrimp(add $3), Halal Chicken(add $1), halal beef(add $2)
Pho's Noodle Soup (Thai Style) (Halal Beef)
21
Beef soup with rice noodles, thin sliced beef, bean sprouts, cilantro and green onions.
Pad Thai (can be made vegan/vegetarian)
18
Stir-fried thin rice noodles with bean sprouts, egg, radish and a side of lime and ground peanuts.
Pad See-iew (can be made vegan/vegetarian) Gluten Free.
18
Stir-fried wide rice noodles with or without egg, Chinese broccoli in a brown sauce.
Drunken Noodle (can be made vegan/vegetarian) Gluten Free.
19

Pad Woon Sen (Gluten Free.)
19
Stir-fried bean thread noodles with egg, cabbage, carrot, and green onion.
Rama Noodle(can be made vegan/vegetarian)
21
Pan fried rice noodle, and steamed broccoli in curry peanut sauce.
Rice Dishes

Curry Fried Rice (can be made vegan/vegetarian)
19
Fried rice with onions, and curry powder.

18
Fried rice with tomatoes, Chinese broccoli, onions and egg.

19
Fried chicken thigh marinated with lime with Anna's special mayo sauce
Cashew nuts Over Rice (can be made vegan/vegetarian) Gluten Free.
20
Cashew nuts, bell peppers, white onion and onion stir-fried with our homemade sweet chili sauce.
Mixed Vegetables Over Rice (can be made vegan/vegetarian) Gluten Free.
19
Stir-fried assorted vegetables in your choice of meat in brown sauce.
Thai Spiced Grilled Halal Chicken Over Rice
20
Chicken thigh marinated in Thai spice grilled to perfection. Served with homemade tamarind sauce with ground roasted rice powder.
Pepper & Garlic Stir Fried with Broccoli Over Rice. (Gluten Free.)
20
Your choice of meat stir fried in the aromatic mixture of coriander, pepper and garlic paste in the brown sauce with broccoli.
Fried Rice Basil
20
Stir fried rice with your choice of meat, fresh basil leaves, onion, bell pepper. Gluten free, vegan and vegetarian.
Sweet & Sour Over rice
19

Chu Chee Salmon
31

Dinner
Served with steamed jasmine rice. Brown rice add $1. Choice of Halal chicken, tofu, mixed vegetables. Halal Beef adds $2. Shrimp adds $3. *Fried egg adds $2.

Our restaurant will be closed from Friday, October 17 to Sunday, October 19. We’ll reopen on Wednesday, October 22 at 4 PM for dinner service. Thank you for your support—we look forward to serving you again soon!

Som Tum Salad
Green Papaya Salad

					Made with Lime-Fish Sauce Vinaigrette, Garlic, Bird-Eye Chili, Tomatoes, Green Beans.

					All ingredients are pounded in a mortar and pestle. The result is a plate of refreshingly melded taste of spicy, tangy, salty, sweet and umami.

					Tastes great with sticky rice and pork rinds. Following are the variations.

About the Business
In Chicago, there are still very few places — if any — that truly represent authentic Lao cuisine. That’s why I wanted to share this part of my heritage with everyone here. Lao food is more than just a meal; it’s warmth, community, and a sense of home.

Pad Thai ($12.95)
Stir-fried Thai rice noodles with  green onions, and egg. Topped with crushed peanuts, this non-spicy dish is one of the most popular, offering a perfect balance of tangy, sweet, and savory flavors.
Pad See Ewe ($12.95)
Stir-fried fresh wide rice noodles with egg, carrots,Chinese Brocoli,and broccoli. Served with a wedge of lime to add a tangy twist to this savory and satisfying dish.
Crazy Noodles ($12.95)
Stir-fried fresh wide rice noodles with egg, carrots, broccoli, bell peppers, basil, Chinese Brocoli, and cabbage. This dish is mildly spicy, offering a flavorful and vibrant mix of ingredients.

Stir-fried jasmine rice with egg, onions, peas, carrots,Chinese Brocoli,  and tomatoes. Served with fresh cucumber slices, this hearty and filling dish offers a satisfying and flavorful experience for any meal.
Spicy Basil Fried Rice ($12.95)
Stir-fried jasmine rice with basil, bell peppers, and white onions. This mildly spicy dish is packed with vibrant flavors and aromatic herbs, served with fresh cucumber slices for a refreshing touch.

and carrots. Served with fresh cucumber slices, this aromatic dish offers bold flavors and a delightful twist on fried rice.

A flavorful red curry with tender chicken, bamboo shoots, Thai basil leaves, and bell peppers, cooked in a rich coconut milk broth with a hint of spice.
Yellow Curry
A classic Thai dish made with turmeric and curry powder, featuring tender onions, carrots, and your choice of fried tofu. This aromatic curry offers a warm, mild flavor that's comforting and satisfying.
Pineapple Curry
A rich coconut milk curry with bamboo shoots, bell peppers, basil leaves, carrots, and sweet pineapples for a perfect balance of savory and tropical flavors.
Appetizer
Edamame $5
Lightly salted steamed edamame, a simple and healthy appetizer that's perfect for sharing.
Veg Spring Roll 2 pieces $4.00
*Contains: Wheat, soy, sesame seeds. Cabbage, onion, mushroom, carrot, vermicelli.
Crispy vegetarian spring rolls filled with cabbage, onion, mushroom, carrot, and vermicelli noodles. Perfectly seasoned and fried to a golden crisp, ideal for a light and flavorful appetizer.
Crab Rangoon 2 pieces $4.00
Crispy wonton wrapper, celery, condensed milk, cream cheese, imitation crab meat.
Crab Rangoon features a crispy wonton filled with a creamy blend of celery, condensed milk, cream cheese, and imitation crab meat. This delicious appetizer is fried to perfection, offering a delightful combination of textures and flavor
Coconut Shrimp 3 pieces $4.00
Crispy, golden shrimp coated in a light coconut batter, crunchy on the outside, juicy on the inside. Served with our sweet&Sour sauce for that perfect tropical kick.
Dessert
$7.95
Mango Sticky Rice
Sweet Thai mango paired with soft sticky rice, topped with rich coconut cream and toasted sesame seeds.
Taro pearls in coconut cream
Soft taro balls served in rich, creamy coconut milk.
$6.95
Taro custard
$6.95
Traditional Thai dessert with a rich, baked taro filling blended with coconut milk and egg.
Soup
Only soup 16 oz
Tom Yam Shrimp $5.95
Tom Yum spices, milk, mushrooms, onion, green onion.
"A rich and creamy version of Tom Yum, blending zesty Thai spices with milk. This flavorful soup features tender shrimp, mushrooms, onions, and green onions, offering a delightful burst of flavors and textures in every spoonful."
Tom Kha Chicken $5.95
Chicken, Coconut milk, mushrooms, onion, green onion.
Tom Kha is a traditional Thai coconut milk soup featuring chicken, mushrooms, onion, and green onion. Its creamy, aromatic broth delivers a comforting and delicate balance of flavors.
Beverage
Thai Iced Tea 16 oz / $3.95
Thai Iced Tea is a refreshing blend of strong black tea, sweetened with sugar and creamy half & half, served over ice. Its rich, sweet flavor and distinctive orange color make it a perfect treat to refresh yourself.
Thai Coffee 16 oz / $3.95
Thai Coffee is a bold, strong coffee sweetened with sugar and mixed with creamy half & half, served over ice. This refreshing drink delivers a perfect balance of richness and sweetness, ideal for a quick pick-me-up.

ABOUT US
ABOUT OUR MENU
WE ARE A VEGGIE-FOCUSED, FLAVOR-DRIVEN, ASIAN INSPIRED RESTAURANT, WHERE YOU CHOOSE YOUR FAVORITE INGREDIENTS AND WE FLASH-SEAR THEM TO PERFECTION. OUR KITCHEN IS A WELCOMING, HAPPY, AND INSPIRING PLACE WHERE CONNECTIONS FORM AND THRIVE.
Our chef and prep cooks are not just good with their hands, they put their heart and passion into the food they create. They celebrate and appreciate every ingredient that enters our doors while strengthening relationships with community partners they admire and trust. Our food tastes great and it is good for you. From the way we marinate and grill our meats, craft our unique sauces, and select local seasonal vegetables, it is evident we take no shortcuts. Everyday, we start this process bright and early ensuring the same high quality food for our first guest and our last.
WE WELCOME THOSE LIKE US WHO HAVE SPECIFIC DIETARY PREFERENCES
All of our sauces are vegan, our entire menu is dairy, fish, shellfish, and peanut-free and 100% gluten-free. Our antibiotic-free chicken is certified Halal as well!
HAVE SPECIFIC ALLERGIES OR DIETARY PREFERENCES?
Let our team know or add some comments on your online order. If you’d like less sauce, no oil, extra spicy, just ask… We’ve got you! Learn more from about our menu’s
NUTRITIONAL INFORMATION
HERE
. As a small business always looking to grow, we’d love to hear from you. Feel free to contact us below or post a physical note in our restaurant’s Suggestion Wok.
OUR STORY
“While working in a fast paced kitchen, I overheard Chef Kolter Livengood talk about how he was making hot sauces at home for fun. I was intrigued. We met for coffee and talked about our passions and love for high quality food. Chef told me about his experience working for five years in Michelin rated kitchens, his appreciation of incredibly high quality and rare ingredients, the “shift pay”, and the stress. He understood the standards of fine dining, but was looking for other ways to share his art that was more approachable.
I was the type of person who would dread dressing up for fancy dinners and would much rather go to my favorite taco dive. Chef and I continued to spend time together and we determined that we had an opportunity to create something magical. We molded our appreciations and positive energy into creating Brightwok Kitchen. Our goal was to serve incredibly high quality ingredients in a very approachable way at very affordable prices. We knew it would be different than previous restaurants we worked at, but that didn’t bother us. It motivated us to work harder and smarter to create something different.”
-Jeremy Klaben, Founder & CEO , 07.30.2015
OUR VALUES
Our team was built with the following values in mind and heart. These values drive our culture and guest experience. We strive for them all day everyday, both at Brightwok and in our personal lives.
SPREAD POSITIVITY
We smile and laugh together forming meaningful relationships.
GROW TO BE BRIGHTER
We challenge ourselves to improve today and tomorrow.
BE PASSIONATE
We love and dream about what matters most to us.
CORE MENU

ORDER.BRIGHTWOK.COM
FEEL FREE TO ASK TO SUBSTITUTE ANY INGREDIENT

HOT BOWLS
WE'RE PROUD OF OUR GROWTH
We started in downtown Chicago in 2015. Since then, our dedicated team has grown, our food quality and sourcing have improved, and our easy
ordering
is even easier and more fun. The Future is Bright.
JOIN OUR TEAM
APPLY TODAY TO JOIN OUR TEAM We’re a bunch of crazy passionate people who’ve joined forces to create something special. We’re yogis, foodies, musicians, hip-hop dancers, knitters, skydivers, and puzzle enthusiasts. We believe in the work we do and would love to have you join our team! At Brightwok Kitchen, empowering others to be their…
EVENTS
Host an Event at Brightwok Kitchen Fill out this form to request availability for a Space Rental. We have two beautiful locations in downtown Chicago. One is located in the Loop and one in River North. Our bright, open, and positive design makes our spaces a great option for team meetings, group dinners, parties, special…
STUDENT PERKS
WE ARE STUDENTS TOO. As a small business made up of a diverse and passionate team, we love being a part of the greater Chicago community. A big part of this wonderful city are the students learning, studying, and cramming for exams near both of our locations! If you're a student we want you to…
TALK THE WOK BLOG
TALK THE WOK BLOG. From our team members eyes to the impact we're working hard to have on our Chicago communities. This is where the stories live.
ALLERGEN + NUTRITION INFO
ALLERGEN INFO: We love our guests who care about what they eat! Back in 2015, we decided to make Brightwok Kitchen a healthy, allergen-friendly, and approachable restaurant! That's why our entire restaurant is 100% Dairy, Peanut, Fish, and Shellfish-Free, 100% Gluten-Free, and 95%+ Vegan friendly. Today, we continue to focus on sourcing high quality ingredients…
LOYALTY @ BRIGHTWOK KITCHEN
As of June 1 2024, Brightwok Kitchen’s Digital Loyalty program has been discontinued. We apologize for the inconvenience. We will be launching an even better program very soon! Check with our store teams regarding coupons and promotions throughout this year in the meantime!
OUR MOST RECENT YELP REVIEWS
I LOVE BRIGHTWOK!! This place is my absolute favorite. It's like chipotle-- asian style. You pick a base, veggies, protein, sauce, and boom you got dinner. Delicious addons like egg
... read more
and yummy sweet potato fritters for low price, all stir fried and mixed in house made goodness. You want a sauce, they got it: bbq, teriyaki, curry... levels of spice, completely customizable and personable. Brightwok has something for everyone. Service is always excellent and workers are so friendly and make the experience wonderful. I always leave feeling satiated, but not food coma satiated which is great. Also, the teriyaki sauce is liquid crack. Super convenient for grab and go situations, and trendy interior makes it fun to eat in aswell. Definitely try Brightwok out 🙂
Skye J.
12/12/2022
I order from this location somewhat regularly and I love how it's vegetarian friendly!
I'm a picky b*tch, so I always do a create your own bowl, but I love their
... read more
tofu.  It has a chewy texture somewhat similar to chicken.  You can choose your spice level for your bowl and so long as you don't pick a sauce that's marked as spicy, they can make your bowl a true mild in case you have anyone in your life who cannot handle spice.  On the other hand, if you do like spice, you can select that.
I find their portions to be generous and I usually get 2 meals out of it.
I'm also obsessed with their magic cake, which if you like chocolate and cashew, is glorious and not to be forgotten.
Lisa C.
11/06/2022
Best lunch spot for tasty, healthy food! Love the curated bowls as well as the ability to build your own.
Jonny F.
11/02/2022
This place is one of my favorite places to eat at on a daily basis. From fresh ingredients to the sweet potato fritters everything is absolutely perfect !
SydneyMason 1.
8/30/2022
HAVE ORDER FEEDBACK?
If you have any questions or feedback regarding a specific Brightwok Kitchen order, please fill out
THIS FORM
and we will respond as soon as possible. You can also call our River North restaurant at 312.366.2999 seven days a week!
HAVE A GENERAL INQUIRY?
Use this form to contact us about partnerships, ideas, or any other opportunities. Please visit our
EVENTS
page if you have requests regarding renting our space or requesting our participation in your events. If you have nutritional questions please first visit our
NUTRITION
page. Our team is looking forward to reading your inquiry.

Online Order
"Welcome to Bangkok Thai Cuisine, IL. We would like to take this opportunity to welcome you to your home to great tasting Thai dishes. We serve only the freshest and finest ingredients.
Here at Bangkok Thai Cuisine, you will experience the liveliness and excitement of our exhibition kitchen. Our extraordinary fast and friendly wait staff wishes to make your visit to us an unforgettable event. You could view our menu and online order ahead - no hassle. "

Welcome
ORDER ONLINE
LULU'S
WELCOME  TO LULU'S
ようこそ
LuLu's is an independent & locally owned restaurant and our mission is pretty simple.     We give a respectful nod to Asian cuisine serving simple interpretations of dishes that are rooted in authentic Asian flavors filtered through an American consciousness, respectful of tradition but not bound by it.
Located in downtown Evanston since 1992 we are proud to be members of a community that supports small independent business.  As such, we have always tried to operate as responsible corporate citizens within our host community.
From all of us we say thank you.  We appreciate the support our customers have provided us over the past 33 years and everyday we will try to exceed your expectations by serving simple, genuine food and drink.

name: Blue Frog Thai
raw_text:
Blue Frog Thai
Blue Frog Thai
Home
Gallery
Menu
Blue Frog Thai has become a beloved neighborhood gem, adored by locals for its authentic and delicious Thai cuisine. What started as a humble family-run restaurant has blossomed into one of the area's top Thai destinations. The kitchen is helmed by experienced Thai chefs who chose each ingredient with care and prepare every dish completely from scratch. They take great pride in their mastery of the unique flavors and techniques that make Thai food so distinctive and craveable. From the perfectly balanced pad thai to the rich and creamy curries, each plate celebrates the vibrant tastes of Thailand. While the menu offers all the familiar Thai favorites, the chefs aren't afraid to put their own creative spin on traditional recipes. Their signature dishes have developed cult followings among regulars. The crispy crab rangoon, savory drunken noodles, and decadent Thai fried rice are must-tries.
Whether you dine in and soak up the warm atmosphere or get your Thai food to-go, Blue Frog aims to transport you to the bustling streets of Bangkok with each fragrant bite. This family's passion for hospitality and incredible cuisine shines through in every lovingly-prepared dish.
2951 S Archer Ave Chicago, IL 60608
(872) 281-5890

Our chefs specialize in authentic and delicious Thai food. The staff at Fine Thai is devoted to serving customers mouthwatering dishes that feature the highest quality ingredients available. N1. Pad Thai Noodles, N2. Lard Nar Noodles and N3. Pad See-Eiw Noodles are all prepared quickly and delivered to you right away.
Fine Thai uses only the freshest ingredients around, ensuring that every dish is of the highest possible quality. Not sure what you're in the mood for? Try one of our specialties including N4. Drunken Noodles , N5. Peanut Noodles, N6. Red Curry Noodles, N6. Green Curry Noodles, and more.

raw_text:

Order Now

Thai classic thin rice noodles stirred in our sweet and tangy homemade pad thai sauce with eggs, ground peanut, bean sprouts, and green onions.
Add Item
Massaman Curry - Tofu
Thai Garden features fresh herbs, spices, seafood, noodles, and rich coconut flavors.
Add Item

Fresh basil, shrimp, tofu, coconut, lime, chili, and vibrant Thai herbs.
Add Item
Spicy Fried Rice - Pork
Experience rich flavors of curry, seafood, fried rice, fresh herbs, and coconut desserts.
Add Item
Authentic Thai Cuisine in Schaumburg, IL
Welcome to Thai Garden, your go-to destination for authentic Thai cuisine in Schaumburg. Enjoy our delicious dishes through dine-in, takeout, or delivery options for a delightful culinary experience.
Order Now
Order Thai Takeout Online Today!
At Thai Garden, customers can easily order delicious Thai cuisine online for convenient delivery or takeout. Located in Schaumburg, we offer a wide menu to satisfy every craving, ensuring a delightful dining experience.
Start Your Order
Customer Reviews
Check out our most recent reviews!
JJ Crisostomo
A nice find of a Thai restaurant here in NW Chicago suburbs. Plenty of parking and we were seated quickly on a Friday night.

Ambiance typical of Thai restaurants with lots of wood and the ever present bar.  Quick and polite service.

Ordered a sampler appetizer, pad Thai and a couple of Thai desserts.  See pics for
...
more descriptions.  All excellent and highly recommended.

Overall, Iâll be back to try their other Thai fare.
Read More
DJ Riz Entertainment
We travel all around the country for Indian and Fusion weddings. Last week we were in Chicago to DJ a fusion wedding. Whenever we are in Chicago, it's usually about pizza. This time we wanted Thai food.

We wanted to go some place that had great food and service. Thai Garden is what we decided to check out. So glad we
...
did.

We expected a whole in the wall. But this place was big and clean. It's nice to know you can bring big groups of people here.

Our servers name was Noi. She was helpful and always smiling.

Our food came out hot and tasted great.

We ordered Crab Rangoon, Chicken Satay and Spicy Friend Rice with chicken. All 3 were great. If you like spicy food, do yourself a favor and get the spicy friend rice.

Can't wait to be back and try more food. Already planning to adding this place to our list of places to eat when we are back in September.
Read More
Holley Swanson
Our visit to Thai Garden was great! We had wonderful service and delicious foods and drinks! The crab Rangoon, a must get! The drinks are beautiful and have such a great taste! My crunchy noodles dish was popping with flavor and I could not get enough!
Nitasha Merchant
An absolute gem in Schaumburg, Thai Garden exceeded every expectation!

From the moment we walked in, the cozy ambiance and welcoming staff set the tone for an incredible dining experience. Every single dish we ordered was bursting with flavor and cooked to perfection.

The Thai Iced Tea was creamy and refreshing,
...
just the right balance of sweet and strong. We kicked things off with the Crab Rangoon, which came out golden, crisp, and filled with luscious cream cheese. Paired with the sweet chili dipping sauce, it was addictive!

Next up, the Spicy Shrimp Fried Rice stole the show. It was packed with juicy shrimp, sautÃ©ed onions, bell peppers, and just the right kick of heat. Squeeze of lime on top? Perfection.

The Beef Salad was a refreshing surprise..tender slices of beef tossed with crunchy onions, cucumbers, herbs, and a tangy dressing. It was zesty, spicy, and super flavorful.

We also tried the Beef Massaman Curry, which was comforting and rich with creamy coconut flavor and tender chunks of beef and potatoes. It was heavenly over jasmine rice.

And letâs not forget dessertâthe baby banana rolls were crispy on the outside, warm and gooey on the inside, and the Sticky Rice with Coconut Ice Cream was the perfect sweet finish. Creamy, slightly salty, and topped with crunchy mung beans..SO good.

This place is a must-visit if youâre in the area. Authentic flavors, beautiful presentation, and generous portions. Thai Garden is officially our new go-to for Thai cuisine!
Read More
Sehrish Tejani
I just had the most amazing meal at Thai Garden and I canât stop thinking about it! I started with the Tom Yum soup, and it was the perfect balance of spicy and sour, just the right kick to get my taste buds going. Then, I moved on to the Penang noodles, which were absolutely incredible. The noodles were perfectly
...
cooked and the sauce was so rich and flavorful, with just the right amount of heat. The Pad Thai came next and itâs honestly one of the best Iâve had. The flavors were spot-on, with that tangy, sweet, and savory combo that I love. To top it all off, the spicy fried rice was out of this packed with flavor and the perfect level of spice. Every dish was fresh, flavorful, and left me craving more. The staff were super friendly and the atmosphere was cozy and inviting. Iâll definitely be coming back soon! Highly recommend if youâre in the area!
Read More
Haley Reid
Absolutely completely impressed! From start to finish it was amazing. We got the crab Rangoon, and three entrees. All were so delicious and came out so quick. The waitress and owner were incredibly nice. Portion sizes were very large. We will be back as soon as possible!
Location
Visit Thai Garden in Schaumburg for an unforgettable dining experience.
THAI GARDEN

Since opening in 2010, Longman & Eagle’s focus has been on sourcing the finest local ingredients in the region to create an ever-changing menu of regional American fare. This farm-to-table, nose-to-tail aesthetic is lovingly represented by Executive Chef Alex Swieton. Her considerate and deliberate offerings are both adventurous and sublime, featuring items that exemplify her passion for creative, flavorful and honest dishes offered at fair and reasonable prices.
MAIN MENU
WEEKDAY LUNCH MENU
WEEKEND BRUNCH MENU
RESERVATIONS
We now take Limited Dinner Reservations, except for the patio, bar or for brunch. That said, we retain plenty of space for walk-ins, so even if we look booked on Resy, odds are you can walk right in and chill in the OSB if there’s a wait.
MAKE A RESERVATION
GROUP DINING
Got a Group? We offer Family Style Dinner Packages. Prix fixe dining options for large groups of 6-14 {must be booked 48 hours in advance}.
FAMILY STYLE LUNCH
FAMILY STYLE DINNER
PRIVATE EVENT INFO
TAKEOUT/ DELIVERY
If you don’t have the time to visit us in person, we partner with DoorDash to bring our delicious cuisine straight to your home.
ORDER NOW
Sign Up For Our Newsletter :-)
Sign Up For Our Newsletter :-)
Sign Up For Our Newsletter :-)
Longman & Eagle
2657 N Kedzie Ave
Chicago, IL 60647
(773) 276-7110
TAKEOUT/DELIVERY

name: Gibsons Italia
raw_text:
Menus & Beverage Book | Gibsons Italia
Reservations
Menus
Reserve Your Table
Private Dining
About Us
Gift Cards
Steak Shop
Careers
312.414.1100
|
233 N Canal St Chicago, IL
Superior Steak. Superior Italian.
Chef-driven tastes of Italy paired with the superiority of Gibsons Steakhouse, creating a restaurant that makes the familiar, exceptional. Refined Italian dishes and American steakhouse classics, including a variety of meats, seafood, vegetables, risotto and gold-extruded pasta. At the heart of the menu is a world-class tour of beef, starring Gibsons Prime Angus, Gibsons Grassfed Australian, Japanese Kobe and Miyazaki, and Carrara 640 Wagyu.
Refined Italian dishes and American steakhouse classics.

The menu features a selection of mezze, Mediterranean small plates, with an emphasis on Hummus & Spreads, Raw, Vegetable and Kebabs. Signature dishes include Hummus w/ Lamb Ragu, Pan-Roasted Romanesque Cauliflower, House-made Stracciatella, Green Falafel with Tzatziki, Grilled Octopus with Fingerlings and Preserved Lemon Vinaigrette and Lamb & Beef Kefta Kebabs.

Before you visit:
• We currently do not offer reservations. For groups of 10+, please click “Host an Event” in upper right menu.
• Kids are welcome in our taproom and beer garden when accompanied by a 21+ adult.
• You may purchase canned beer or packaged goods to take home.
• Our outdoor patio is dog-friendly.
• For the safety of our guests and staff, lightning, thunder, or rain will require immediate closure of the patio.
• No smoking in the patio, parking lot or within 15ft of our building.

About the Business
"Welcome to Shinya Grill and Bar, an inviting izakaya-style Japanese restaurant in Wicker Park. Experience Yakitori, the soul of Japanese grilling, with tender chicken, seafood, and grilled veggies. Indulge in authentic flavors, sourced locally and from Japan. Pair your meal with premium sake, whiskies, and handcrafted cocktails. Our attentive team ensures an exceptional dining experience. Join us for an unforgettable culinary adventure and discover why we're the ultimate destination for Yakitori enthusiasts in Chicago. Come, savor the art of Japanese grilling at Shinya Grill and Bar today!"
…
Read more
Ask the Community
Ask a question
Q:
Byob? U guys don't have good wine. Can I bring my own
A:
Yes, you can bring your own wine, but there’s a $5 per bottle of wine charge since we need to keep up our license taxes and fees.
Shinya I., Business Owner
1 person found this helpful
See question details
Q:
Is the Izakaya kid friendly?
A:
Yes, we also have high chair and booster seats provided.
Shinya I., Business Owner

concept
Brasero Brazilian Food
Chicago
Named one of the Best New Restaurants in the Country by Robb Report.
Nominated by The Banchet Awards for "Best New Restaurant" 2025
Named by our guests as one of OpenTable’s Best Restaurants this year
concept
Conceived in South America. Born in Chicago. We call her Brasero. Drawing on decades of discovery, renowned chef John Manion has crafted a memorable dining experience that is both innovative and grounded in tradition.
philosophy
Vira Lata. A lifetime of people, places, and passion on a plate. Served with ambiance, flare, and a dash of bravado.
philosophy
offerings
Shareable bites & hand-muddled cocktails. Hearty steaks & fresh seafood. A novel wine list featuring 100 South American bottles under $100.

What does one wear to Ever?
A:

A 20% service charge is added on to ensure they can provide a living wage for all staff, but gratuity in addition to this is at your discretion.

name: The Duck Inn
raw_text:
The Duck Inn • Menus
The Duck Inn
2701 S Eleanor, Chicago
(312) 724-8811
Home
Menus
Ship
Photos
Parties
News
Team
Signup
Contact
Site TitleSite Slogan
Our Signature Rotisserie Duck
The Duck Inn’s signature dish is a simple yet elegantly-prepared whole rotisserie duck. The legs and thighs are slow-roasted for three hours and the breasts are pan-roasted medium-rare to order. The carved duck is served over greens tossed with duck fat dripping potatoes and seasonal fruits. The final component is a duck jus reduction served at the table.
We serve only the ducks made that day so we offer guests the opportunity to preorder the dish and reserve one for the table.
Please call
(312) 724-8811
in advance to reserve your table and your rotisserie duck.
Site TitleSite Slogan
The Duck Inn Dog
The Duck Inn Dog
is our tribute to the classic Chicago Hot Dog. Made with all-natural beef and duck fat in a hog casing and grilled to a perfect snap, our dog is topped with all the classic ingredients of a Chicago dog. Homemade mustard & relish are combined with our own pickled hot peppers and pickle, tomatoes, onions, and celery salt, all nestled in a one-of-a kind brioche poppy seed bun.
The Duck Inn Dog has received numerous local and national accolades; named
Top Dog
by Food Network and recognized in Food & Wine magazine's
Best Hot Dogs in Chicago
.
Site TitleSite Slogan
Our menus
Site TitleSite Slogan
Transparent pricing
Our menu contains no surcharges or fees therefore our prices reflect our commitment to working toward a living wage for all of our staff, as well as assistance with healthcare costs for our beloved employees.
DINNER & DRINKS

Champagne & Sparkling Wine
Featured Vintage Champagne
Michel Gonet, "Les 3 Terroirs", Blanc de Blancs, Extra Brut, 2019
Champagne is passion. On one hand it is a beverage that seamlessly represents celebration for many, and on the other is one of the most meticulously handled wine products on Earth. At Michel Gonet, the care goes from vineyard to cellar, from hand harvest to long lees aging. The result is a champagne of the highest quality and finesse. The "Les 3 Terroirs" cuvée highlights vineyards from the three villages of Le Mesnil-sur-Oger, Montgueux, and Vindey.

American White Wine
Featured Chardonnay
Soliste, "L'Age D'Or", Russian River Valley, 2016
Burgundy born-and-raised, Claude Koeberle is considered one of the world's foremost experts in winemaking, and his wines never cease to disappoint. "Soliste" comes from the name that winemakers in Burgundy use for a special barrel reserved solely for family and friends. Most of their wines are made in what he calls the "MonoClone" style, using single clones from single sites and aged individually in a single cooperage. "L'Age D'Or" is a true expression of Soliste wines—exceptional vineyards, meticulous grape selection, and an elegant balance of acidity and aromatics to create wines of complexity and finesse.

French White Wine
Featured Sancerre
Domaine Vacheron, 2023
The Vacheron family name in Sancerre is viticultural royalty. Three generations ago the family took over their first vineyards. As their family grew so did the pedigree of their bottlings. From humble beginnings by then-patriarchs, Denis and Jean-Louis, the estate now boasts biodynamic farming, harvests by hand, and some of the finest vineyards in the appellation. It is not a wine trying to reinvent Sancerre, but to be an elevated version of the classic style.

White Burgundy
Featured Chablis
Domaine Laroche, "Saint Martin", 2023
Domaine Laroche is steeped in the history of Chablis. For more than 160 years, the Laroche family has been dedicated to producing top quality wines from the Chablis region. The domaine's headquarters, the Obédiencerie of Chablis, reveals a heritage dating back from the Middle Ages when the Canons of Saint Martin of Tours were making wine. The "Saint Martin" title pays tribute to a Roman cavalry officer who became a humble monk and was elected Bishop of Tours, eventually being named the patron saint of Chablis. The "Saint Martin" cuvée is the flagship wine of Domaine Laroche, a blend of the most beautiful estate plots in the appellation.

German Riesling
Featured German Riesling Trocken
Dreissigacker, Rheinhessen, 2020
Jochen Dreissigacker has quickly ascended to the category of the elite producers of Germany's Rheinhessen. Jochen abandoned a career outside of winemaking, and joined the family winery following apprenticeships at other benchmark estates including the now-legendary Weingut Keller. Dreissigacker organically farms fruit from the most iconic vineyards in the Rheinhessen, producing laser-focused and textural wines that are delicious now and worthy of age in the cellar.

European & International White Wine
Featured Spanish White
Valenciso, "Fermentado en Barrica", Rioja, 2022
Valenciso is the lifelong dream of Luis Valentín and Carmen Enciso, coming to fruition in Rioja Alta in 1998. They set out to create modern interpretations of the classic Rioja style. Using Burgundy as a north star, the Viura and Garnacha Blanco are aged in new French oak barrels to develop a rounded and creamy texture. Sourced from 75-year-old vines at almost 2,000 feet above sea level, there is an aromatic freshness and precision to these carefully crafted wines that are sure to surprise and delight.

American Pinot Noir
Featured Pinot Noir
George, "Hansen", Russian River Valley, 2022
George Levkoff has quite the impressive resume: a graduate degree from University of Chicago, a decade spent as a US bond trader, which he abruptly quit to start an internship at Williams Selyem in order to explore his true passion for wine. The best part? He is the least pretentious, most caring farmer you'll ever meet. He makes Pinot Noir that reads Burgundian on the nose and Sonoman on the palate, only makes three cuvées, and, even more incredibly, only makes 200 or fewer cases of each. Who better to create and personally bottle your Pinot Noir than the same person who cares for the vines year round?

American Syrah
Featured Syrah
Pax, El Dorado County, 2022
Pax Mahle has always been focused on producing great wines from great vineyards. From the onset of his career he channeled his energies into sourcing the best fruit he could find and, if he couldn't, would farm it himself. After the success of his initial project, Pax and his wife Pam founded the eponymous Pax Cellars. Utilizing much of the same land for this label, he started to produce an entire range of wines focused on elegance, freshness, and Old World techniques. All his grapes are hand-harvested, foot-crushed, and fermented whole cluster–a nod to his favorite producers in the Rhône–and he has continued to innovate by farming Chenin Blanc, Trousseau Gris, Gamay, and Vermentino. The gold found in El Dorado County in 1848 was the start of the Gold Rush in California, but Pax's "gold" is the granitic-covered hillsides that produce Syrah that enchants and satisfies in the same sip.

Other American Red Wine
Featured Zinfandel Blend
Mending Wall, "Mortar and Stone", Napa Valley, 2022
The name "Mending Wall" comes from the famous Robert Frost poem about two neighbors who meet once a year to examine the boundaries that separate them and that bring them together. The Mending Wall winery is a multi-family endeavor, consisting of winemaker Thomas Rivers Brown, along with proprietors Frank Dotzler of Outpost Wine, and Mark Pulido and Donna Walker from Pulido-Walker. The goal of this team was to build a winery around the spirit of wine itself: a place where wine is shared and enjoyed without pretension. This bottling of "Mortar & Stone" is not an exception to this philosophy, as fruit is sourced from one of the last dry-farmed and head-trained vineyards in the Napa Valley.

"Left Bank" Bordeaux
Featured Haut-Médoc
Château Belgrave, Haut-Médoc 5ème Cru, 2015
Before the wines of the estate were world-renowned, Château Belgrave was a hunting lodge used by King Louis XIV–you can see this evoked in the artwork on the label. When an Englishman purchased the estate in the early 20th century, he renamed it after the London neighborhood he resided in: Belgravia. Situated on the outskirts of the St-Julien appellation, right down the street from other Grand Cru Classés Château Beychevelle and Château Lagrange, the wines are some of the finest produced in the Haut-Médoc each year. So committed are they to excellence that they are one of very few estates that have remained the same size since they were classified in 1855. A delicate, yet powerful balance of bright ripe fruit and rustic terroir, Château Belgrave's wines are quintessential expressions of the best "Left Bank" wines Bordeaux has to offer.

"Right Bank" Bordeaux
Featured St-Émilion Grand Cru Classés
Château Corbin, 2015
Château Corbin is one of the oldest estates in St-Émilion, tracing its history to the 15th century. The Cruse family has been in charge of the property since 1924, passed down from generation to generation to a female heir, making Anabelle Cruse the fourth generation to helm the estate. She is assisted by her husband Sébastien Bardinet. The estate is planted in one large block on the doorstep of the Pomerol appellation. Their secret lies in the two soil types that make up their vineyards: ancient sands over an iron-rich subsoil, and clay near the Pomerol border. These terroirs directly influence the wines, which are known for possessing both power and delicacy, while maintaining freshness of fruit flavor and aromatic purity.

Red Burgundy
Featured Côtes de Nuits-Villages
Didier Fornerol, 2022
Didier Fornerol made his name in Burgundy as the cellarmaster at Domaine de l'Arlot, one of the most respected estates in Nuits-St-Georges. Having worked closely with Jean-Pierre de Smet, he honed and crafted an expressive winemaking style based on whole-cluster fermentation. Didier departed in 1999 to take over his family's domaine in the small village of Corgoloin and has been raising the standard of the Côtes de Nuits-Villages appellation ever since, producing wines of soul and character in an undersung part of Burgundy. Another secret? Though Jean-Pierre de Smet retired from Domaine de l'Arlot, he works incredibly closely with his former protégés in the vineyards and cellar.

Featured Gevrey-Chambertin
Jean-Luc & Eric Burguet, "Symphonie", 2020
Alain Burguet, father to Jean-Luc and Eric, started his domaine after returning from military service in the 1970s. As a young man, he helped older vigneron tend to their vines, and as they gradually retired, he was able to purchase many small parcels across the Côte de Nuits. He approached his vineyard management in this old-school way: plowing his vineyards with horses, allowing cover crops to grow, and encouraging a diverse ecosystem around his vines. His sons officially took over in 2011 and are the first ones with any formal winemaking education in the family, having worked in California at Au Bon Climat, as well as at Domaine Tempier in Provence. The Burguets are frequently among the last to harvest, often seven to ten days after their neighbors, resulting in wines with more finesse and velvety tannins. This wine is sourced from parcels planted in the early 1980s just to the east of the Route des Grands Crus, and is a great example of Burgundy that is forward-thinking with traditional roots.
