Honey-Glazed Chicken with Almonds & Cranberries
Carb Conscious
This is one of those dinners where every bite is a delicious surprise. All-natural chicken breast coated in a fragrant honey glaze, served over roasted parmesan broccoli and cauliflower, and topped with toasted almonds and tart cranberries. It’s crunchy, sweet, savory, and so satisfying.

Creamy Parmesan and Artichoke Shrimp
Get ready for Italian comfort food.  It starts with a creamy and downright addictive artichoke sauce (think of your favorite hot artichoke dip). Then we’re mixing it up with sautéed shrimp and roasted broccoli – served on a bed of orzo.  With fresh garlic bread on the side, it’s a dinner the whole family will go crazy for.

Nashville Hot Tofu Sliders (Vegetarian)
Nashville hot chicken is everywhere, so we created a vegetarian-friendly version. With extra-firm tofu in place of chicken and our own mix of spices, we came up with a taste that we love even more than the original. We’re making sliders with chive aioli, a soft, tender bun and roasted fingerling potato fries. Even non-vegetarians will love this dish!

Lemon Chicken Souvlaki
Carb Conscious
We adore the flavors of a classic Souvlaki, but on a busy weeknight, marinating the meat and loading up skewers is more work than we want. Ours is a streamlined version with lemony chicken served over a flavorful rice pilaf and cooling roasted red pepper Tzatziki sauce.  it is just as flavorful but without the fuss.

name: Hopleaf Bar
raw_text:
Hopleaf Bar  |  Lunch and Dinner
Hopleaf Bar
Promoting Better Beers, Wines & Spirits in Chicago since 1992.
Belgian-inspired Kitchen featuring our famous Mussels & Frites.
Welcome to the Hopleaf Bar!
Menus
Draft Beer and Bottled Beer
Lunch & Dinner Menus
Wine List
Events
Upcoming Events
Past Events
Event Galleries
Galleries
Art
Event Galleries
More
History
About our Food
Gift Certificates
Contact / Hours / Locations
Lunch and Dinner
→ Lunch Menu
as of July 23, 2025
Lunch is every day from 12 noon to 5pm. We feature our famous mussels & frites, appetizers, soup, salads, and the sandwiches. Please click the link to see the most recent lunch menu.
Lunch is served with table service in our original dining room, and in the backyard patio (during the warm months when it’s open.) You can also order at the bars for eating in the booths, and at the bars and bar-room tables.
→ Dinner Menu
as of July 23, 2025
Starting August 6, dinner is served daily from 5pm until 10pm most nights, until 11pm Friday & Saturday. (Until Aug 6 dinner hours are one hour later—till 11 most nights, until midnight on weekend. Please click the link to view the most recent dinner menu!
Dinner is served in most of Hopleaf’s spaces. Table service is available in our original dining room, in the south dining room near the kitchen, on our mezzanines (when open), and in the backyard patio (during the warm months when it’s open.) You can also order form the full menu at both the north and south bars, for eating at the bars, in the booths, and at the bar-room tables.
HOPLEAF BAR
5148 North Clark Street
Chicago, IL 60640
773-334-9851
Limited reservations now available on
Tock
—just search for Hopleaf! If reservations there are complete, please give us a call. We do reserve a fair number of tables for walk-ins.
Hopleaf is an adult venue—everyone must be 21 or over with valid ID to enter. Sorry: children (including infants) will not be admitted.
Hopleaf is open almost all days of the year, at Noon every day, except as noted specifically. We will be closed Dec. 24 & Dec. 25, to let our staff celebrate the holidays with family.
View Hours and Menus
© 2025 Hopleaf Bar - Chicago

by Swartwerk Media Design, Inc.

from here on…
Within Chicago's Old Post Office Building, From Here On food hall aspires to create a fast-casual marketplace that best exemplifies the city's West Loop neighborhood. We are an all-local market featuring delicious eateries like
Tempesta
,
Hot Chi Chicken
, and
FARE
, representing the city's history and future in the culinary and artistic realm! Our travel-themed bar,
Snorkelbox
, specializes in handcrafted cocktails made in equal measure. Enjoy small-batch pastries, healthy lunch options, and happy hour cocktails in one unique downtown location.

raw_text:
Somerset Chicago | Mediterranean Dining at Viceroy Gold Coast
Skip to main content
Menu
About

Contact
Viceroy Chicago
Viceroy Hotels & Resorts
Find a Table
Choose Location
Find a Table
Bright Flavors & Gold Coast Glamour
Somerset brings the bold, vibrant spirit of the Mediterranean to the heart of the Gold Coast at Viceroy Chicago. Rooted in the rich traditions of Southern Europe, North Africa, and the Middle East, Somerset blends old-world flavors with a fresh, modern edge.
Warm spices, bright herbs, and stone fire breads define the menu designed for sharing and discovery. With every bite, you’ll taste the dance of zesty harissa, smoky zaatar, and the earthy warmth of pistachio and dukkah.
Paired with curated wines, inventive cocktails, and a chic, inviting atmosphere, Somerset transforms every meal into a dynamic celebration of flavor, culture, and connection.
Upcoming Events & Activities

Join us for a day of autumn fun at Somerset’s Annual Pumpkin Patch—the perfect fall event for families, kids, and even your furry friends! We’ve got plenty of activities, treats, and contests for everyone to enjoy.

TAKE OUT/DELIVERY OPTIONS
To Go
TOP ^
FAQ
Do you take reservations?
We do not take reservations, first come first serve! We do ask that your full party be at the restaurant before we seat you.
Do you offer take out and delivery?
We currently offer our limited take out menu through Toast for pickup! As our woodfired pizzas are thin and have very low thermal mass, we highly recommend reheating our pizzas briefly when you arrive home. Set your oven to 500 degrees, use a baking stone or steel if you have it, and heat in oven just until the cheese begin to bubble slightly. Our Logan Squares Detroit Style pies are ready to eat out of the box, but always better with a quick reheat as well!
Do you have gluten free options?
We do! We have an award winning gluten free Detroit style pizza dough, that can be incorporated with most of our Detroit style pizza menu!
We also have gluten free salads and desserts available!
How much Pie Pie My Darling Cake can I order?
Due to the popularity and the limited quantity of PiePieMyDarling’s amazing cake, each guest may purchase one slice of cake for each pizza purchase they make. This will apply to in house as well as take out.
Do you offer service for Special Events, Pop Ups, and Catering?
Yes! For private events, pop ups, and all sizes of catering, please contact
pgchicagocatering@gmail.com

hello, oak brook.
we’re ready to treat you to real food & serious flavor.
Location & Hours
Download Menu
Group Dining
Catering Menu
Seasonal Menu
At True Food Kitchen, our menu is carefully crafted so that every bite and every refreshing sip serve up big flavor, an abundance of fresh ingredients and a taste of the unexpected. Our artisan chefs create crave-worthy classics alongside a steady rotation of seasonal offerings that take advantage of naturally ripe fruits and vegetables so their flavor is full and their nutrients, rich. Creative, hand-crafted beverages built around seasonality, quality ingredients and simple preparations complement every occasion from brunch, lunch, dinner and, of course, dessert. Always room for dessert.
Important Information About Our Menu
Menu pricing varies by location – to view location-specific menus, visit our
locations
page.
*These items may be served raw or undercooked. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions.
Please be aware that our restaurants use gluten and ingredients that contain all the major FDA allergens (peanuts, tree nuts, eggs, fish, shellfish, milk, sesame, soy and wheat).
Our restaurants have shared cooking and preparation areas and the possibility exists for food items to come into contact with other food products. Due to these circumstances, we are unable to guarantee that any menu item can be completely free of allergens. In addition, while effort is made to keep our product information current and as complete as possible, it is possible that ingredient changes and substitutions may occur due to differences in regional suppliers, recipe revisions, preparation techniques, and/or the season of the year.
Before placing your order, please inform your server if someone in your party has a food allergy or a special dietary need and we will do our best to make accommodations.
View our nutritional guide
here
.

True Food Kitchen restaurant is located at Oakbrook Center
Visit our Oak Brook restaurant to dine in or order online for pickup or delivery.

About the Business
A traditional self-serve mexican bakery where you walk in, grab a tray and tongs, and let the fun begin! Choose what your heart desires from conchas, gorditas dulces, delicious empanadas or from our large assortment of cookies. Our pan dulce is made fresh daily from scratch with quality ingredients & baked throughout the day. 
A favorite among our costumers are our scrumptious flour tortillas made at our location with only the freshest ingredients. While our flour tortilla is our most popular, we do have other tempting flavors to offer such as: margarine, wheat, jalapeño, chile guajillo, habanero, chile morita, chipotle, black bean with jalapeño, mole and our newest addition avocado flour tortillas. All of the tortillas have no animal product, excluding margarine.

reservations
Neighborhood Italian Dining
Centered around a wood-fired hearth, we create sophisticated yet familiar dishes using expert cooking techniques. With a frequently updated menu of wood-fired pizzas, housemade pastas, and farm fresh salads, etta is a celebration of rustic cuisine that is thoughtful of the season.
The Secret to Our Craft
At etta, our commitment to excellence shines through our meticulous attention to detail and dedication to quality. We select only the finest ingredients, treating each with the utmost care to enhance their natural flavors. Our culinary team, experts in wood-fired cuisine, works tirelessly at the heart of our open kitchenâour vibrant hearthâto perfect every dish. From our wood-fired pizzas to our seasonal salads and family-style feasts, every bite is a testament to our passion for food and hospitality.

Dine-in and Delivery/Pickup Hours
All our dishes are 100% vegan. All are gluten-free or can be ordered gluten-free unless otherwise specified. The few dishes on our menu that are gluten-free or contain allergens are prepared in a separate kitchen to avoid cross-contamination. Let the server know if you have any specific dietary restriction.

Source of protein.
Masala Dosa | $10
A thin golden crepe stuffed with spiced Potato and Onion, served with Sambar and Coconut Chutney.
Sambar contains protein.
Idli | $10
Oil-free, steam-cooked cakes served with Sambar and Chutney.
Source of protein.
Uttapam | $10
Lentil and Rice Pancake, served with Sambar and Coconut Chutney. Topped with combination of your choice of fresh garden vegetables: Cilantro, Onion, Bell Pepper, Carrot, Tomato, Green Peas, Thai Chili Pepper.
Source of protein.
Entrees
With Basmati Rice (substitute: Organic Brown Rice, Quinoa for $2 extra)
Chana Masala | $13
Sun-dried Chickpeas seasoned with Cumin and Fresh Onion, sauteed and topped with Tomato Gravy.
A high-protein dish.
Baingan Bharta | $13
Clay oven fresh roasted Eggplant, sauteed with Onion, Green Peas, Tomato, Ginger and Garlic, perfectly blended with assorted Indian spices.
A very popular dish.
Palak Paneer | $13
Fresh Organic Spinach and pan-seared vegan Cheese, seasoned with Cumin, Onion, Cinnamon, Cardamom, and Garam Masala spices.
High in Iron.
Organic Tofu Tikka Masala | $13
Sauteed Smoked Vegan Cheese, Bell Pepper and Diced Onion, topped with stir-fried Organic Tofu.
Bell Peppers are a good source of vitamin C and B6, and good for your hair and skin.
Dal Bunzara | $13
Fresh Moong Lentils, sautéed in Olive Oil with Cumin, Fresh Green Tomato and Onion.
A popular Mom’s homemade Indian dish. Great source of protein and antioxidants.
Palak Dal | $13
An exotic blend of Yellow Lentils and Fresh Organic Spinach, seasoned with Ginger and Garlic.
High in Protein and Iron.
Malai Kofta | $13
A Sweet Potato and Green Vegetable dumpling, topped with a delicious Cashew Gravy, garnished with Cardamom, Almond and Cashew.
Most popular Arya Bhavan dish.
Dal Makani | $13
Black Lentils, pan cooked with Tomato, Ginger and Garlic.
Good source of protein.
Breads
All made vegan
Tandoori Roti | $5
Whole Wheat clay-oven baked round flat-bread. (with gluten)
Naan | $5
Unbleached clay-oven baked flat-bread topped with cilantro. Flavor choices: Plain, Garlic, Onion, or Coconut Butter. (with gluten)
Gluten-Free Bread | $6
Desserts
Naturally sweetened, with no refined sugars
Tiramisu | $10
Our newest addition, already a fan favorite! Four-layer tiramisu cake: vegan, gluten-free, sugar-free…absolutely delicious and with an Indian twist, of course!
Raw Organic Mango Cake | $8
No processed ingredients, naturally sweetened with no added sugar.
Lemon Bar | $8
Zesty, creamy dessert bar; naturally sweetened, with no added sugar. Raw Dish.
Drinks
Non-alcoholic options & BYOB (with corkage fee)
*NEW* Immunity Drink (Hot) | $5
Powerful detoxifying, anti-inflammatory drink containing 8 different Ayurvedic spices plus lemon, fresh mint and a dash of honey.
Mango Lassi | $8
Indian vegan yogurt drink.
Hot Tea | $3
Masala Ginger Chai tea with choice of Almond or Soy Milk.
Young Coconut Water | $8
Bottled Water | $2
BYOB Ok; corkage fee
Chef Kirti’s Ayurvedic Spice Mixes
Available for purchase at the restaurant
Masala Tea Mix | $11
Indian spice mix to make Arya Bhavan’s Masala Ginger tea (makes about 35 cups)
Immunity Ayurvedic Mix | $11
Mix containing 8 Ayurvedic spices with strong detoxifying, anti-inflammatory and anti-cancer properties. Used to make Arya Bhavan’s Immunity Drink (hot). Comes with recipe to make the drink (makes 35-40 cups).
Indian All Spice Mix | $11
Sprinkle it on salads, fruit, vegetables, lentils, beans, hummus, vegan burgers, soups, and smoothies for added flavor! (5 oz. ca.)
Sambar Masala Mix | $11
Spice mix for Sambar soups (5 oz. ca.)
Chana Malasa Mix | $11
Spice mix for the Chana Masala dish (5 oz. ca.)
Pau Bhaji Mix | $11
Spice mix for Arya Bhavan’s Pau Bhaji dish (5 oz. ca.)

RESERVE
MENUS
Experience a culinary journey through Latin America with Chef Sandoval’s carefully curated menu, where each dish—whether it’s a perfectly grilled steak or a succulent fish—captures the essence of the region. We elevate your dining experience with the freshest local ingredients and exotic imports from Central and South America, delivering bold flavors and unforgettable dishes.
Join us for breakfast, weekend brunch. lunch, dinner, weeknight happy hour, and late-night bar bites.

We’ve been extremely fortunate to show host to thousands of dedicated eaters from locales near and far. As such, we feel it is our obligation to give back to the communities that support us and support our love for meat and heavy metal. Ask your server about the charity of the month and consider donating to what we feel are worthy and deserving causes. Read over our menu and check out the wide selection of rotating craft brews and spirits we carry year round. Our bars feature an exclusive selection of small label whiskeys and many other varieties of alcoholic and non-alcoholic libations as well as carrying the distinction of being able to offer several whiskeys on tap.
Experience our award-winning cuisine and drink the best local craft beers around. Make the pilgrimage to the Metal Burger Mecca.

Uvae is a community minded, neighborhood small business committed to approachability, diversity, and inclusivity. Our globally inspired menu is designed to be shared and paired with our extensive wine list.
About us
Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel
Review by - Google
five star review by
Jenbala Y:
Had dinner here, and it was a pleasant experience. The sommelier was knowledgeable and nice, with the wine pairings being the highlight. The food was prepared with care, but the taste was just alright. Good vibes overall. I'd come back for the wine tasting and happy hour deals.
Review by - Google
five star review by
K O:
Artistic yet delicious ...the best of plates were beet salad and blood orange paired perfectly with a blanc de noir. Then the sous vide beef tenderloin was incredible and a tempranillo. Uvae's owner was complemented by staff, and they dished up quite the experience. Bravo!
Review by - Google
five star review by
Bernadette C:
We were going to eat at another restaurant which there was an hour wait. We were uable to wait due to a show we were going to, so we looked across the street and there it was, Uvae!. We can't say enough of how the management, hostest, server and server's asstant were very nice and attentive and ofcourse how delicious the food was. From the 3 appetizers we ordered and the 4 dinner dishes we ordered all agreed everything was exceptional. Looking forward to our next visit.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Jennifer M:
We came here for girls night during restaurant week.  Absolutely awesome place. Service by far was excellent paired with very delicious food... thank you chef! Highly recommend Uvae.  I will definitely be coming here more often. We had to r Brussel sprouts with pork belly, deviled eggs, duck fat frittes,butternut ravioli. I have so much more yet to try!
Review by - Google
five star review by
Helen B:
Uvae is a great new wine bar. We enjoyed the goat cheese and tomato, fried zucchini with mole sauce and the fried smelt as appetizers. We had the scallops and the steak with farro risotto for the main dish. Everything was excellently prepared and the service was friendly. It was fun to see such a new place so busy after only being open for a month. A great addition to Andersonville!

October 21, 2022
July 9, 2024
We are ready to cozy up with you this Winter and we have some special new menu items, too!
Enjoy our Croissant Sandwiches, Carrot Lox Bagels, or some Cherry Lavender Scones with a Creme Brulee Latte. For lunch we have Greek Spinach Pie, Fancy Grilled Cheese, Truffle Mushroom and Brie Pastries with Arugula Salad, and more.

Our Story
A
re you in the mood for delicious food using fresh ingredients at an affordable price? 

            If so, then we are the spot for you.
We opened Ichiban Ramen to offer scrumptious food to our diners that can be enjoyed in our restaurant or picked up 

            for a fantastic feast in the comfort of your home.
Our menu features many mouth-watering dishes including amazing specials like our award 

            winning crab rangoon and scratch made sushi.
We love doing our part to feed the local community.
Try us out today, you will not be disappointed!

WELCOME TO TANUKI!
THE OUTSTANDING BYOB RESTAURANT IN CHICAGO!
Bring your own brews, bevs, beers, bottles, wine — Whatever but no hard liquor please!
Thank you!
Tanuki Sushi bar is a Japanese and Asian restaurant that presents dishes that are both authentic and Contemporary in our very own way. Each dish has been delicately chosen and meticulously garnished with innovative intentions. We are very meticulous in our way of choosing the finest ingredients and raw materials so our customers are presented with the finest dishes, as if we were to cook these dishes for our families in our own home.
Feature of the Month!
NEW ITEMS DROPS
Premium Toro (大とろ)
The most prized cut of bluefin tuna belly, known for its rich marbling and buttery texture that melts in your mouth. A true delicacy for sushi lovers!
Seasonal
Flavors!
Treat yourself to our limited-time mochi ice cream collection — soft, chewy rice dough hugging rich, creamy ice cream. Perfectly bite-sized, perfectly indulgent!
Passion fruit | Green tea | Lemon cheesecake | CHocolate
If you haven’t tried our new favorites yet, now’s the perfect time and stay tuned for more tasty updates from us!
TANUKI HIGHLIGHT
SUSHI-ZZA BOX
Our signature creation that’s
more than a meal — it’s a lifestyle!
A bold fusion of sushi roll in a pizza-style presentation, designed to gather friends, spark conversation, and turn every table into a celebration!
“If you want to stay on-trend, this is your move —”
grab the box!
🚗
We’re Expanding Our Delivery Area!
We’re now delivering up to
10 miles
from our location!
Our delivery boundaries are fixed within a
10-mile radius
, so more of you can enjoy Tanuki at home.
How to check if we deliver to you:
Go to our
online ordering system
Select
“Delivery”
Type in your
address
🎯 If it works, we’re rolling your way.
🚫 If it says “Out of area”… we’re truly sorry, but you’re still welcome to pick up and say hi!
Need help or have questions?
Just give us a call. We’re real people and we’re happy to help you!
Check your delivery zone
takeout/ delivery
SAVE 10% OFF
ON PICKUP/ DELIVERY!
SEPTEMBER
PROMO CODE “MONTHOFFALL”
AT CHECKOUT AT
TANUKICHICAGO.COM
Plus, choose 1 free item
with a purchase of $20, $40 or $60 - just select the item
from “Free Item” category and add it to your cart.
Sushi-Zza™ box GIVEAWAY!
➡️Get our Sushi-Zza Box, take a picture, post it on your Ig, and
Tag us
to enter!
Details:
One winner will be announced on the
21st of each month
on our Instagram.
Each tag counts as one entry, so tag us as often as you like!
Follow us to stay updated and see if you're the lucky winner!
Start tagging today and good luck!

Thank you to everyone who participated and shared the love! Didn’t win this time? Don’t worry — our next giveaway is just around the corner.
Stay tuned to our website for more exciting updates and promotions!
